101 | Hyperion 04/18/2021 4:10 AM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Update ] Good evening, I'd like to say thank you to those who have chosen to make the leap of faith and join us. Your help and experience is truly appreciated by all! As we try to build and mesh this community together I wanted to make some points, especially for those who came from our former home. Please understand that things will be different here for a while, we are trying to build a community that players want to return to and become apart of. That said, when you are staffing remember that you are not in a large server with 100's of players and a massive player base to replace the people you kick and ban. When you are staffing you need to be more of a "community ambassador" and make people want to return to the server. Be professional, kind, polite and fair. You MUST be respectful to new members so that they leave with a good impression. Be as helpful as you can with those who need it. If and when you encounter a clown, do your best to reason with them, correct them and set them on the correct path. Try to give people chances to improve their role play and EXPLAIN why they can or cant do certain things. Not having multiple staff calls means you have plenty of time to spend with someone helping/explaining server guidelines and rules. If they ask a question you can not answer ping one of us in staff chat and we will try and answer the question. Cont... (edited)
04:11
If you encounter a troll that is mass rule breaking and not listening to reason or you have warned them and they continue then obviously you may take action within the guidelines to kick/ban them. If you are a trial moderator or reserve staff needing a ban and there is no moderator in game, feel free to ping the staff role and see if a moderator+ is available to join in game. If they are not place the person on the BOS list. Currently there is no set hourly requirement for staff members, however you must still be active. I want to see you guys either in game role playing or staffing a few times a day. Keep an eye on the #💻・player-list channel for a count on how many players are in game. If the player count is rising, then we know we need 1 or 2 staff in game if possible. For now, there is also no need to be in staff RTO while staffing, simply monitor the easyadmin log to watch for calls. However, if a modder comes in please join staff RTO until the issue has been resolved. Also, keep an eye on the discord for any trolls there. Thanks. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/18/2021 7:30 PM
[ Update ] All, While staffing the server please try to be as incognito as possible. There is no real need to drive marked staff cars around at the moment. If you spawn in an unmarked staff car do not drive though active scenes just to look around, or drive in the middle of a 10-80, just stay no cliped if you wish to watch. Overall I prefer that you operate in the shadows so to speak, out of sight until you either get a call or see something you need to intervene on. This helps players to remain immersed in their role play and not be distracted by out of roleplay issues. Also, Jake W. has chosen to leave the team, he stated he was not ready to give up what he had in his other server. He also stated he may put back in here in a few months. Thanks.
101 | Hyperion 04/18/2021 9:52 PM
[ Assignments ] Head Administrator Positions: Head of Staff Operations: VACANT (Management currently filling in) - This key position is responsible for the daily operations of the staff team. This includes selecting new staff applications for new staff to be voted on by all of the head administrators, ensuring activity is tracked and maintained, update and maintain the staff roster, carrying out disciplinary tasks once approved, organizing staff promotions, updating the LOA section and ensuring the overall fluid activity of the team. Head of In-Game Operations: @308 | Grandpa KC 🚔 - Responsible for maintaining and overseeing staff in game. This includes staff conduct, use of commands, dealing with incidents in-game and any in-game commands. This position should ensure proper response to staff calls as well as enforcing staff RTO guidelines. Also includes monitoring #deleted-channel. Head of Discord Operations: @110 | ozzymon68 - This position is responsible for all issues relevant to staff and discord moderation. This includes #deleted-channel , ensuring staff are monitoring public discord channels for any violations as well as incidents involving voice channels. This position should also ensure staff have proper roles, names and do not have offensive or inappropriate status showing. Head of Public Relations: @161 | Joseph S. - This position will be tasked with assisting the Public Relations Coordinator with building and maintaining a proper and efficient Public Relations Department. This department is in it's early stages and will be slowly expanded in the coming weeks, months. Head of Development Operations: VACANT - This position will be tasked with assisting the Development Coordinator with the daily tasks of development. This will include development related tickets, vehicles, peds, scripts, maps and general maintenance of the server and it's resources. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/19/2021 4:47 PM
[Conduct in other servers] All, Just wanted to remind everyone of the staff guideline that pertains to conduct in other servers and discords. No staff member should be going into another server, in this case TheRedLineRP to advertise, break server rules and troll. You represent this server when doing so and this shines a very negative light on our team. I was advised that members from our server were doing this, obviously we have no control over regular members however if any members of staff are involving themselves in this ridiculousness they may find themselves without the staff role very quickly. Thanks.
101 | Hyperion 04/20/2021 12:19 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Meeting & Quick Reminder ] All, This Friday at 5pm EST we will hold our first staff meeting. This will be a top down staff meeting, meaning everyone in the team from Owners to Trial Moderators & Reserve Staff are asked to attend. We will go over our first week's progress, issues that may have been brought up and any suggestions or questions you all may have. Looking forward to seeing you all there. Meeting will be held in the staff meeting channel in discord. Please join in 5-10min prior to the start and remember to mute your mics. There will be PTS or if you would like to submit any questions before hand you may use the meeting talking points form Link here: https://forms.gle/2iTiDhLBytd4Xi8bA Secondly, please remember that everyone from management down must be talking to those in game who may be violating server rules before taking any actions against them. Make sure to give them an opportunity to explain their actions before kicking/banning. The only exceptions of course are for modders or those spamming chat with blacklisted words. Taking the extra 20 seconds just to ask, "Why are you doing that" or advising them that it is against server rules before kicking/banning will help to avoid staff complaints and ban appeals. Always get their side of the story as well as the person reporting them. Hope everyone has a great day, enjoys some good role play and have fun! Thanks.
Meeting Talking Points

101 | Hyperion 04/25/2021 7:26 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Please remember to establish a reasonable AOP for the amount of players in server. Having an AOP of Los Santos with 15 players is not ideal. Please utilize the below "general" guide. (Sandy Shores / Paleto Bay / Mirror Park) Should be your primary areas of play. Yes I know they get old but players will interact with each other more in those locations at lower player count levels and stay in the server longer. (Sandy, Grapeseed, Harmony) Is another option that will keep people in a reasonable area for interaction but allows some spreading out. (Los Santos Beach Area) This is another option for around 20 players they can utilize the beach, board walk and some of the streets north of the beach. (Blaine County) This option is for 30+ players, best for around 40 and will allow RP in all areas of Blaine County. (Los Santos / State Wide ) At this point these AOPs should not be used unless we have a large influx of players aka over 65/70 and if that happens please ping me and everyone above me in the chain of command so we may celebrate this momentous occasion lol. Also, things of note. If you are not in staff RTO please do not change in game settings including the time/weather, peacetime etc... The only exception is if you are the only moderator in game. If you are the last to leave game at night and there are no other staff on, please make sure AOP is set to Sandy and peacetime is OFF. Do a quick car clear and call it a night. No need to ping staff however it would be great if you were to put a note in staff chat that you are leaving game, how many players are in and that no staff is on. We don't expect 24/7 staff coverage overnight with little to no players. Keep up the excellent activity during the day, I've been happy seeing several staff giving time to the server. If you notice plenty of staff on but a lack of LEO or Civ feel free to switch over to LEO or CIV and create some good roleplay. Excellent work guys, Thanks!

101 | Hyperion 04/27/2021 12:56 AM
[ Promote the Server ] Gents, If you so choose, and would like to help promote the server on the FiveM forums. Go to the link below and add a reply to the server post. This will bump the server thread up and it will be viewed by more people. Currently we have 76 views, some posts have over 2-4k views. If you choose to post, promote and speak highly of the server, you should be careful to use proper grammar, and sentence format. You may choose to post every few days if you wish to keep the thread alive and near the top. Remember to post positive reviews and aspects of the server! Oddly enough, after I posted this evening we had our largest player count at 20 and our biggest new discord member surge of the day. Side note, from what I'm told it's best to post at our peak hours. But feel free to post at your convenience.
This goes without saying but do not post this link in general chat, we do not want trolls posting crap.
https://forum.cfx.re/t/san-andreas-roleplay-custom-emergency-service-scripts-accepting-applications-vmenu-doj-based-cad-more/2663761 (edited)

As the end of our first two weeks nears we have a few promos to make to help fill a few positions and move a few tmods up. If you were not promoted this round please continue to be active and professional in the server and you will be considered in the future. Also ensure you are clocking your hours and using /staffduty so that you are recognized for your time.
With that said, please congratulate the following individuals: Administrator -> Senior Administrator @Blits Moderator -> Administrator @211 | Pach Moderator -> Senior Moderator @RBass @StrictBark Trial Moderator -> Moderator @Chizza @Nate M.

101 | Hyperion 05/02/2021 1:27 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] Update, Hope everyone is having a great weekend. As i'm sure most of you know we seem to have hit a good growth spurt over the past 3-4 days. We are now averaging good numbers during the day(40s) and night(20s). Due to this I'm accepting several more staff members to give us some breathing room on the team. Administrators+ will be working diligently to get good folks interviewed and trained in a timely manor. As far as the current team, I will be looking carefully at the player numbers during this coming week to see if we maintain these numbers during the week or if they will be more so on the weekends. If numbers continue to look this good we will likely institute hourly requirements. These may be requirements for the week as a whole or simply for Friday, Saturday, Sunday depending on how things pan out. Due to the increase in players, please ensure you are now in staff RTO while on staff duty. Remain active and work together to ensure staff calls are answers. Thanks guys, everyone from Charlie & Alex down to the newest member appreciates the efforts of the staff team to help keep the server both productive and controlled. if any needs anything please let me know. Thanks. (edited)
6
101 | Hyperion 05/02/2021 10:39 PM
[ Staff Cars ] All, Thanks to @211 | Pach the staff cars are nearly ready. Once they are in server please adhere to the following guidelines. 1) Only drive the vehicle(s) to which you are permitted to by rank 2) Engine upgrades are fine, torque up to x4 is also fine. 3) The primary color of the vehicle should remain black, you may however change the color of the stripe to match your inner soul. 4) Vehicle rims should remain stock or otherwise professional looking. No donks, spinners, zippers or dollar signs. 5) Only Senior Administrator and up are allowed to run unmarked. 6) You may use or not use whatever extras you would like. Slick top is fine for any staff rank. 7) For your tag, please use STAFF, SARP or your name. If you are admin+ you may use ADMIN 8) You must LOCK your staff cars, especially until they are blacklisted. We do not need clowns running around in staff cars. 9) Trial Moderators do not have access to staff cars and should focus on learning the ropes of staffing without a staff car, Lastly, remember that you do not always need to be in a staff car. Staff cars have their purpose but should also not be used all the time as it tends to ruin the immersion of roleplay. If for example the server is hectic and specific areas are getting out of hand, it is beneficial to make a few sweeps in a marked staff car to let members know there are active staff in the area. This tends to calm the area down a bit and run off some of the clowns. Also, do not drive like a jackasses. Set the example for others to follow when in a marked staff car. This privilege can easily be taken away. Thanks and enjoy!!
6
Charlie S. 05/03/2021 7:50 AM
Staff Hire(s) Alright ladies & gentlemen, The Management Team have come to unanimous majority vote to bring on two new members to the San Andreas Roleplay High Staff Team. Firstly, I welcome Zooma. Zooma will be assisting myself in the Command of the Development Team. Spreading the workload out amongst myself, and others, whilst also bringing the likes of a quality Discord Bot, Entity Logs, with the plans to make more. Zooma will be initiated at the Head Administrator Position, working alongside many other great names! Secondly, we are bringing aboard Tack, Tack will be serving himself in the Development Team, alongside Zooma, others, and I. Thus, once again, reducing that workload, and creating a better experience for the entire Server. Tack will be initiated as a Senior Administrator. For those that don't know, these two individuals are both Australian, and will serve in an immense help Staffing the Server in times were we are desperate, that being early European times, which will take the stress of some of you, which is great! Please welcome them, with open arms. Other than that, I would like to thank each & every Staff Member for Staffing the Server over this immensely busy weekend. Awesome work from you all. If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions in regards to the Staff Team, we're open to anything. Have a great week! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. Charlie S. 05/04/2021 11:23 AM
Badger Anti-Cheat Afternoon all. As some of you are aware our Anti-Cheat system was playing up from the previous Server Restart, with players unable to connect and being listed as "Banned", by the Server. Therefore, I have temporarily stopped the script, meaning some of the moderation features in the Game Server have stopped too. So, until this issue can be fixed, if you experience a Prop Modder in-game, please notify a Management Member either in / out of-game, so they can temporarily start the script, so that an Entity Clear can be performed. Sorry for the inconvenience. Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff
Charlie S. 05/05/2021 12:37 PM
Staff Bot Command(s) Good afternoon all. Thanks to @Zooma, you guys now have to some new Commands to play around with and use, on the Discord, within reason, of-course. Anyway, they go as follows: Management Command(s)
➤ Server Restart Cue - "/restart <MESSAGE>" Sends a restart message to #the-restart-channel, the message is optional.
Head Administrator Command(s)
➤ Fake Ban - "/fban <USER>" "Fake" ban's a Member from the Discord.
Staff Team Command(s)
➤ Staff Team Ping - "/staff <MESSAGE>" Pings the entire Staff Team, if they are in need of assistance. An optional message can be added at the end, if needed. ➤ Server Down - "/down" Simply informs Management that the Server is down and it needs a restart.
If there are any Commands you would like to see added to this, simply put them in #deleted-channel, and Management and Zooma will review them accordingly. Just keep in mind, all Moderation Commands are done by DynoBot, and will continue to be. Cheers & Enjoy your day! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff

2
101 | Hyperion 05/06/2021 6:58 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff RTO ] Lets discuss Staff RTO functions. Over the past few days there have been some complaints and confusion on the general operation of staff RTO. While most of you have a long history of staffing servers, some of you are new and understandably adjusting to how staff operate. With that said lets go over some of the issues that have been brought up. - First, remember that ALL ingame commands such as car clears, aop changes, peacetime and time/weather changes etc. must be done from inside staff RTO. Do not change any ingame settings while not in staff RTO. Owners and Managements are exempt from this as they may be working on or testing things that may require an ingame setting to be changed. Remember that all ingame commands/changes are logged. - Second, If you wish to change an ingame setting while in staff RTO you MUST get consent from the highest in RTO before making the change. If the highest in RTO is deafened, you must poke them and stand by. If you do not get a response within a reasonable, short time frame you may ask the next highest that is not deafened. Do not makes changes without approval. - Third, if there are two or more individuals in staff RTO who hold the same rank and are both considered "highest" they should work together to make decisions on ingame commands. If there is a dispute or disagreement then the member holding the highest staff rank who has been IN staff RTO the longest will make the choice. (Example: Ozzy & Joseph are both head admins, if they cant agree on whether AOP should be LS or BC then whoever has been staffing IN RTO the longest will have the final decision. Users current time in teamspeak during that session can be seen by clicking on their name and looking at the client info on the right side of the screen. - (edited)
18:59
- Forth, Please do not be AFK in staff RTO. If you will be away from the keyboard for more than 5min please move yourself to the AFK channel. Please do not remain deafened in the staff RTO channel. This prevents other staff from properly communicating with you should an issue arise. - Fifth, Remember to monitor the EasyAdmin Logs while staffing and please ensure you are reacting to your calls before you actually respond to them. Thanks guys for all your efforts to see this server succeed! I will likely be bringing in another round of trial moderators in the coming days. Hope everyone has a great weekend! (edited)
101 | Hyperion 05/08/2021 8:17 AM
[ Activity Check & Required Hours ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Many of you have been doing an outstanding job of staffing when the member base is active. That dedication is both noticed and appreciated. Now that we have a predictable player base of around 30 players each day for many hours at a time, we will now institute a minimum hourly requirement of 5hrs a week. (Does not apply to Reserve) None of you should have any issues meeting this minimum as those of you currently clocking in work much more than that in a weeks time. However those not clocking in will need to ensure they show evidence of activity. Finally, the following individuals need to up their hours to remain active in the team. While there hasn't been a minimum requirement it was still made clear that everyone should be active during the times of high player activity. Some of you may have been active but failed to clock any hours, please make sure to correct that moving forward. - @Shotgun - @3X-04 | Marcos S. - @Deleted User Gentleman, please start clocking your hours both ingame via /staffduty and via the #deleted-channel form. Thanks. (edited)
Charlie S. 05/08/2021 12:28 PM
Server Rules Good afternoon & weekend to you all! In approximately two-to-three hours, the newest revision to the San Andreas Roleplay Community Rules List is going to be released. The first update since the release of the Server. If you have the time, please take yourself through the Google Document below, and bring up any concerns, or suggestions you may have, before the release of these. For the most part, the rule list remains relatively the same, but there have been a few additions & changes to certain rules. San Andreas Roleplay - Community Rules https://docs.google.com/document/d/1h0f5IX2pegSQ5AjVK6aWBVtVLGh79QdR4x9Nn71Q0CE/edit?usp=sharing Do not worry if you don't have the time right now, but you will be expected to read these before your next Staff Duty. Appreciate it ladies & gentlemen, have a great weekend, stay safe. Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff

Charlie S. 05/08/2021 6:15 PM
Development & Permissions Update Sorry for the second ping of the night ladies & gentlemen. Anyway, following the next Server Restart, courtesy of @Zooma, we will now have a working Entity Clear Script, alongside an updated Vehicle Clear Script. As a result of this, the need for Badger's Anti-Cheat is fully gone, therefore the script will be removed, and will no-longer need to be started, if there is ever a modder in the Server. Furthermore, the Chat Clear Script has also been fixed too, and you will no longer get a permission error when performing the Command. This is restricted to Senior Moderator's. Lastly, Senior Administrator's+ will no-longer get permissions errors when performing "/stop", "/start", and "/restart" commands anymore, for whenever the occasion calls for it. Cheers all! Commands
Car Clear Command - "/carclear" Entity Clear Command - "/entityclear" Chat Clear Command - "/clearchat"
Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff (edited)

101 | Hyperion 05/09/2021 4:12 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] Happy Sunday everyone, A few points to update you all on today. We have switched to carlbot as the primary warn/mute/ban etc.. bot. Please take a look at the new post in #deleted-channel and read over the Discord Commands section to see the new commands and their functionality. The server bot will work in cunjuntion with Carlbot using the same / command. So far there are no conflicts between the two other than with the /purge command and it will be resolved soon. Also, the permissions for the server logs has been fixed/updated. Most of you wont notice this change unless you are a staff interviewer. Interviewers now need only to give the staff team role to new applicants to allow them to see the staff directory and server logs. You no longer need to give them tmod during the interview. This will prevent an untrained tmod from going in server without training with full perms. Following the interview simply leave them with staff team roll along with the awaiting training role. The trainer will then request the tmod role be assigned once they are ready to begin training. One thing you all will notice in logs is that we now have a #deleted-channel channel. This channel will be used to log modder's screen shots once caught in the server. When you catch a modder in screen shots simply copy the top text of the post and paste it into the modder screen channel, then go back and hit copy link on the image and past it below the text. Tracking these screens helps us all stay up to date on what to look for in the future and really helps new moderators learn what mod menus look like. Also remember to keep an eye out for player blips, weird lines, text, circles in the middle of the screen or other non gta/fivem menus all of which may indicate a modder. If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask, hope everyone has an excellent weekend! #800bytonight (edited)
2
101 | Hyperion 05/10/2021 1:05 PM
[ Car Clear & Entity Wipe ] All, The command for entity clear is now /entitywipe it has been changed in the #deleted-channel channel, car clear is still /carclear. The script has been updated and should not have the issues it did yesterday. Please let me know if you have any issues of things not clearing specifically after modder activity. Thanks!
101 | Hyperion 05/11/2021 5:04 AM
[ TeamSpeak Bot ] All, Thanks to @Zooma's help we now have a working teamspeak bot. The bot will monitor several things including offensive nicknames, idle times and deafened times. Offensive Nicknames: - The bot will kick any member who tries to utilize an offensive nickname. It will prevent them from connecting as well if the nickname is not changed. Staff RTO: - If you remain deafened in staff RTO for longer than 15min it will move you to AFK and send a reminder message to not stay deafened in staff RTO. - If you utilize the TS3 recording software in staff RTO it will remove you from the channel with a message not to record in staff RTO. Normal RTOs: - Idle time warning @ 15min - Idle time move to AFK @ 20min - Idle time kick from TS3 @ 2hrs If there are any issues please report them to #deleted-channel Thanks.
101 | Hyperion 05/11/2021 8:59 PM
[ Evidence Repository ] All, It was a suggestion this week that we create a channel for staff to drop in-game evidence such as clips, links and screen shots that may be relevant to staff complaints, ban appeals or alerting other staff to a specific member's behavior in game. This was echoed by many of you when I gauged whether or not it was a desired overall. This channel is of course optional however it is always in your best interest to clip/record your staff patrols as it protects you. I will evaluate the channel's use over the next 30days, if it is not utilized it will be removed to save space in the staff section of the discord. Also, all evidence will be purged monthly if not needed. #📮・evidence-drop Thanks. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 05/14/2021 10:28 AM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Clockin ] All, After some debate and comparing the manual clockins accuracy to the #⏰・staff-clockins clockins, I would like to run a test for the next 30 days. For the next 30days you will not be required to use the google form to clock hours as staff. Since your staff duty time is logged and totaled in staff-duty this will eliminate some possibilities of false clockins and inaccuracies. However, and this is a BIG however... If you go on staff duty using /staffduty and after an hour you choose to go RP as LEO/FD/CIV ect.. you MUST remember to use /staffduty once again to go offduty as staff before you go RP. If we notice staff role playing while on duty as staff and not in staff RTO you will get a nice reminder to go off duty as staff. Remember your status prints to the channel. If you log out or crash your time will automatically be stopped and totaled so no worries about that. Simply remember to go back on duty when you log back into the server. Also if you are onduty as staff and caught AFK for an extended period of time in server (not answering call admins or not responding in staff RTO) you may be sent off duty. The staff-duty channel has also been moved to the staff directory so we can more easily monitor staff going on/off duty. Once @Zooma gets set up in dev he will work on getting us a live in game staff counter similar to the in-game player count at the top of the discord. To search up your clock-ins go to the staff-duty channel, hit CTRL F and in the search section type this exact format: in:#⏰・staff-clockins during:may Julian G. You must use your exact in-game name and you can change May to whatever current month it is. Current requirement is 5hrs a week or 20hrs a month. If this works well for the next 30days we may stick with it. If not we can switch back. I will also keep the google form as a back up. Hope everyone has an excellent weekend! #1000bySunday Thanks! (edited)
101 | Hyperion 05/14/2021 7:33 PM

Jail Script Abuse Evening all, I am currently aware of an issue whereby Modder's are abusing the Server Side of the Emergency Services Duty Menu to jail player's, although a fix my not be imminent, Development and I are looking for a fix. Anyway, for those that don't know, this type of Modder is detected in #🔶・server-jailhosp, and will label the time as "Inf". Take the following screenshot as an example, and if you're in-game at the time of this, you know now how to located & ban such Modder. https://gyazo.com/a00cea8adeafc114f0f8ae72a4099674 Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. 101 | Hyperion 05/17/2021 3:18 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, We now have a new Staff Bot that is capable of logging all of your staff hours, retaining a record of it and multiple other things. Please divert your attention to #deleted-channel for the new bot procedures and commands. The dev that built this bot is also looking to ad LOA functions and a quota system so that you know how much more time you need to hit the required amount. When going on duty as staff you will use the command listed in the channel. It will log you onduty, update your role to show you as SARP | Staff On Duty and place you in a new section just under the server bot. This will allow us to easily see who is staffing the server at all times in the discord. Once you clock out in the channel it will remove your role and return you to your normal position based on rank/title. You MUST ensure you clockin and out at the appropriate times. If you are done staffing for the day clock out, if you go on as CIV/LEO/FD ect.. make sure to clock out. Otherwise your time will continue to accrue, you will remain showing as "On Duty Staff" in the discord and two things will likely happen. An Admin+ will likely ping or DM you to go off duty immediately or they will force you offduty with a command. Your time may also be purged if you clocked multiple hours of inaccurate staff duty time. The best rule of thumb is: If you are in Staff RTO, clock in. If you leave Staff RTO, clock out! If you have any questions feel free to ask, more is explained in the staff clockin channel. You can also click the pinned comments and the channel description to see commands/info. This is still not the perfect system as you still have your in game staff commands to go onduty and show staff blips etc.. However it's still easier than the google form. Let me know what you think and how it works out for you guys! (edited)

1
101 | Hyperion 05/25/2021 6:59 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Any Department / FAA / Roles ] All, As we are a fast growing server there will be times we encounter issues that need to be clarified. In an effort to clarify the any department's role in FAA I met with charlie this evening and discussed the recent issues and confusion regarding flight permissions. All members of the staff team who are any department members or are HC in FAA please note the following:
1) Any member who possess the "Any Department" role may fly under the commercial and helicopter license/roles without training. However as the any department guideline states, you must abide by in game FAA guidelines and policies as it relates to specific aircraft, uniforms and flight operations. Any member, including any department members who violate in game guidelines of a department are subject to disciplinary actions or removal. Those with the any department role should be the most trusted therefore the most responsible. Lets keep it that way shall we? 2) Any member who possess the "Any Department" role may NOT activate as a subdivision of FAA such as blue angles or cargo and should not have those roles unless they apply for and receive training in those respective subdivisions. 3) If any 01 or HC member of a department has an issue with a member possessing the Any Department role they are to contact Charlie directly. *Only management and owners are exempt from this.
- Giving/removing roles: Those of you who have been given the ability/responsibility to give and remove roles are NOT to remove roles from someone of your same rank or higher for any reason. Example: A Head Administrator is not permitted to remove ANY roles of another Head Administrator. If you for whatever reason, see the need to remove a role from someone of your rank or higher you must DM me with your reasoning and I will make the decision. I hope this clarifies some of the confusion. #1500bySunday? (edited)

Charlie S. 05/30/2021 1:51 PM
Priority Cooldown An issue has stangley arisen with the Priority Cooldown Script used within the Server, setting Cooldown to 100 minutes, when activated. It has not been edited, or tampered with, to my knowledge, so a fix isn't going to be easy, since I'm at work tonight too... In the mean time, I ask that you utilise the "/onhold" command for the duration that you wish for Cooldown & PeaceTime to be enabled, and once you wish for it to be toggled off, simply do "/cooldown" & and immediately after do "/resetpcd". I understand that may cause some confusion, however, this is what we shall have to endure for the next day or two. If you find ways around this, please notify a Member of Mangement, so that an update can be pushed out, but as long as I do not see a Cooldown of 100 Minutes, there isn't a problem. Cheers! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff
Charlie S. 05/31/2021 8:16 AM
Ban Requests This mainly goes out for our lovely Trial Moderator's of the Server. The entire Management Team has the ability to remotely Ban a player, even though the Management Member may not be in the Game Server. This spans from a few messages, I've seen in #💬・staff-chat. Of-course, it goes without being said that a Moderator+ should be in the Server, but if this so happens to be the case for a prolonged amount of time, and a player "SUSTAINS" their efforts in joining back to the Server, please do not hesitate to contact one of us to remotely ban, in the same way you would request for a Ban in the Staff RTO. When Directing Messaging a Management Member; Firstly attempt to contact one of us who is online, and be concise with the time-requested, and reason. Therefore, allowing for quick & prompt action to be taken. Thanks! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Trial Moderator
Charlie S. 05/31/2021 10:28 AM
Priority Cooldown Afternoon all, hope you're well. The priority cooldown script has been fully re-worked, and has now been fixed for the next Server Restart! The HUD Text remains identical, however, there is one change the Command in which I think will suit you all better! That being, you can now decide the length of the Cooldown required. Simply do the following Command: Cooldown Command
⌨️ /cooldown <MINUTES> - I.e. /cooldown 15
This script is being added with immediate effect, since our current one is broken, so as a quick rule of thumb, do not enable Cooldown for more than 25 minutes at a time. Hyperion may change this, but until then, maximum of 25 minutes. If there are any issues, with the Command, please make me aware immediately. Thanks! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S. @SARP | Server Staff

101 | Hyperion 06/07/2021 2:02 AM
[@SARP | Server Staff] All, Few issues I wanted to discuss. 1) All staff (excluding reserve, management and owners) must check in with RTO prior to going into roleplay with any department, civilian or otherwise. When you join please ask those who have been on the longest if they need relief, if not you may jump into roleplay. It's always a good idea to check back in after a while and volunteer to relieve someone so that they may roleplay or take a break if they wish. 2) If you are actively staffing, stop screwing around in server. This includes drifting cars while driving around, trying to blow up a limo or starting a priority while staffing. If your RPing while it's slow it must be passive. I do not want to see 4 staff on duty but only 1 staff member answering calls. Spread the load out, pitch in and go to calls. The head admins and myself noticed when someone is staffing but not responding to call admins or taking other staff actions while in server. 3) If an admin+ chooses to change a game setting, do not argue or debate the necessity of the action. If there is a big enough issue DM the next highest ranking member and express your grievance. Do not debate the actions of a higher up in RTO, game chat or in discord chat. 4) Try to spread out your staff time as best you can so that we have more coverage during multiple times of day. Try your best not to all clump up during the same time of day if possible. I also want to brag on you guys. This is the most tight knit, mature and capable team I've ever worked with. The fact that a large number of staff of all ranks got together tonight to watch a boxing match in discord says a lot about how well you guys work together. When it comes down to it we are a gaming community and I want everyone to enjoy being apart of it while taking our job as staff seriously. Help each other out and make good choices. Thank you all for the hard work! Thanks, Hyper SARP | Community Management (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/14/2021 12:08 AM
[ Staff Suggestions ] All, #deleted-channel has been reformatted and now uses the bot to organize the posts. Please make sure to enter ALL suggestions henceforth using the following bot command: /suggest <text/content/link/etc> This will generate a bot suggestion post that can only be reacted to by using +1 or -1. The higher the +1's the more that suggestion will be considered. Please only discuss the suggestions in #💬・staff-chat so the channel stays clear and organized. This will help individual suggestions actually stand out and not get lost in conversation. If you posted something today, go a head and re-post using the bot. Big credit to Zooma for adding this feature!

101 | Hyperion 06/16/2021 3:43 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff of The Week ] The SARP Owners & Management team continuously seek to recognize the excellent work and dedication shown everyday by our members of the staff team. It is for this reason the “SARP | Staff of The Week” program has been developed and instituted as a way of rewarding those who support both the server and the team. Each week a member of the staff team will be named staff of the week and receive the following rewards and distinctions: - “SARP | Staff of The Week” Role in the main discord - Access any of the server car packs for the duration of the week. - One time use $20.00 store voucher - May drive any staff vehicle unmarked, slicktop. (must abide by traffic laws in RP, subject to being pulled over if in unmarked) The selection of the staff member of the week will be voted on by HA+ and based on the following criteria: - Hours clocked in/Activity & Calls answered in logs. - Overall performance, conduct and teamwork abilities. - Work on special projects assigned (media, dev, support) - Interviews/training conducted for Admin+ Conditions for eligibility will consist of the following: - Senior Administrator and below (trial moderators not included) - No disciplinary issues or verified staff tickets in the last month. - Members are eligible only once in a 2 month period. - Must meet or exceed the monthly activity requirements for staff. - Must not be on LOA or extended LOA. Some conditions subject to change as this program rolls out. Thank you all for the time and dedication you give to this server and I hope in some small way we can give back to you guys! If you can think of other rewards for staff of the week please dm me directly. Staff of the Week guidelines have been added to #deleted-channel document. Thank you, Hyperion *SARP | Community Management *
4
4

8
101 | Hyperion 06/19/2021 11:44 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Quick Chat & Activity Check ] All, We're going to talk a bit about staff hours and the current coverage we are seeing. First we are a rapidly growing server with a staff team of 33 active members not including reserve, management and owners. Of those numbers 26 are NA, 8 are EU and 2 are AU. With those numbers we should "normally" be good on coverage in NA afternoon to late evening hours (2p-10p EST). We should have "ok" but not great coverage during the EU mornings into their afternoon times as it tends to be a bit slower for us. (5am-12p EST) Where we should be hurting the most is during 12a-5a time slot which would be best covered by AU which we only have 2 of and both are many times busy with development. During this time I do not expect NA staff to work all night to try and staff the server, that's not realistic. Please do not spam ping staff for coverage during this time frame. If no one is able to respond to the ping, simply leave peace time in effect and note that you are going to bed and there are currently no staff in the server. As we grow that time slot will be easier to cover. With all of that said, remember that we all have our own time zones, jobs, families, school etc.. I do not expect you guys to ensure 24hr staff coverage, that is not realistic at this point. We've come a long way in the last few months but there will still be a few gaps in coverage at times. I would however rather the gaps be at 2am EST rather than 2pm EST when 50+ players are on. We have two choices when it comes to growing the team. One is to accept 90% of the applications as long as there are no serious violations on record and grant them the trial mod role to see if they work out or not. This will obviously cause more issues, complaints and drama within the team. The other is the method I have been using which is being selective, looking for mature level headed and or experienced individuals who stand out and rise to the top of the applications. This method is slower but we end up with a quality team. I would like to do some open interviews with members who are in departments in the next week or so and see if we get any quality applicants. Other than that it's simply a waiting game. You guys are my best recruiters, if you notice someone who stands out in the server and is mature and professional, urge them to put in and DM me with their information. As far as activity level goes, the majority of the team is working far more than the required hours. Some I swear may be superhuman in the amount of time they are dedicating. I would ask that you not work all of your hours in one week and then not show up for 3 weeks. Spread your time out so that we have better coverage. Out of 33 there are 5 members who have fallen behind on their hours this month. I challenge the following individuals to raise their staff hours in an effort to help everyone on the team: DALE (ID: 119149349824364544): Staff - 0 days, 6 hours, 13 minutes and 28 seconds pudding (ID: 190303445100658699): Staff - 0 days, 7 hours, 3 minutes and 33 seconds Blitsog (ID: 438438540842500097): Staff - 0 days, 5 hours, 40 minutes and 40 seconds pyro beast (ID: 517448526888960011): Staff - 0 days, 8 hours, 58 minutes and 3 seconds Tack (ID: 570895054932279296): Staff - 0 days, 4 hours, 17 minutes and 16 seconds Many of you on this list have worked a ton to help this server grow and you may simply be a bit worn out. That's understandable, take a break, rest and reset. Remember that even staffing just 1hr a day helps. Don't get me wrong we have an excellent team. Honestly I would much rather work with this 33 person mature team than go back to my former 80 member team half of which lacked even a quarter of the maturity level this team has. That's a fact. Thanks.. Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/20/2021 4:29 PM
[ Game Activity ] As a reminder, Per staff guidelines, please ensure your game activity is turned on while you are staffing. This is not an attempt to spy on anyone, in fact if you are playing on a different server while on your off time I would prefer you disable game activity. But please remember to enable it while staffing. This helps us determine who is actually in server while staffing and clocked in. If you are clocked in but game activity shows you playing Fortnite then we know we need to log you out and adjust your hours. Several of you have been forgetting lately so a friendly reminder is in order. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/23/2021 9:24 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Guideline Update ] This is to clarify an on going issue that has been noted in the last week. Please remember if you are on duty as staff, you may NOT create any priorities. You may only passively roleplay under the conditions listed below. This means no criminal roleplay at all while on as staff. You may not run from LEOs, shoot, take hostage, steal etc.. You may however create interesting passive role play which enhances the community by it's creativity. Guideline Section: (In Game Guidelines)
13.) On duty staff may only PASSIVELY roleplay during times of low call volumes and or low player counts. You must continue to monitor incoming staff calls and may need to end the roleplay to respond if staff members are lacking in the server. 13.1) No on duty staff member is to create ANY PRIORITY call.
Several of you have been informed of this but seem to ignore the directive. Further violations may result in the following: - Being sent off duty for 24hrs - Being placed on staff suspension - Demotion to previous rank. If the problem continues, we will restrict any RP while staffing. Thank you, Hyper (edited)
102 | Alex M. 06/24/2021 2:21 AM
Server Modders [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Late announcement I know, but something has been brought to my attention that is crucial for you guys to know. Recently certain mod menu creators have added a new feature in there mod menus to allow people to impersonate another persons chat. For example, they can make people say things, without the actual person saying it. These types of modders try to get people banned, and protect themselves. Now.. from here on out, you must always freeze and check with the person that may be spamming such words that involves racism, etc. If there seems to be an active modder within the server at the time that is happening. If its obvious the person is showing grieve to the community with his words in chat, then pursue at your own discretion. Thanks!! Signed, Community Owner | Alex M.

101 | Hyperion 06/25/2021 9:15 PM
[ Head Administrator Assignments ] All, With the recent promotions within the Head Administrator Team the assignments have been updated for each of the Head Administrators. This is to more evenly distruibe the duties of running the team among the Head Administrators.
Head of Staff Internal Affairs Head Administrator: @308 | Grandpa KC 🚔 The Head of Staff Internal Affairs is responsible for maintaining the Internal Affairs Team which consists of both Staff Investigators & Ban Appeals Reviewers. This position will ensure all staff tickets, complaints and ban appeals are being handled professional and in a timely fashion.
Head of Staff Recruitment Head Administrator: @110 | ozzymon68 The head of staff recruiting is responsible for the "on-boarding" of all new staff members including reviewing and selecting applications for possible acceptance into staff and ensuring their interviews and training are conducted in a timely fashion. This position may also organize open interviews if approved.
Head of Staff Personnel Head Administrator: @211 | Pach This position is responsible for the upkeep of all staff personnel documents including the staff roster, guidelines, interview and training documents etc.. This position will also monitor staff activity requirements, including clockin activity and and LOA status.
Head of Support Team Head Administrator: @161 | Joseph S. This position is a division head position tasked with expanding and running the daily operations of the Support Team. This includes accepting new members, ensuring proper training of new members and handling of all support team tickets.
Thanks, Hyper SARP | Community Management (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/29/2021 1:37 PM
[ Staff Complaints ] All, In the last few days we've seen an increase in staff tickets related to complaints. I wanted to take this opportunity to as a reminder to ensure you are doing the following:
1) You must speak to all members prior to kicking/banning. When you speak to them advise them why you are there and ask them why they committed the infraction. There are some rare cases where they may have an explanation or will apologize for their actions 2) Don't get baited into arguments with people, simply advise them of the server rule, get their response and then carry out whatever punishment you see fit. (warning/kick/ban) 3) Be specific in your kick/ban messages. State the exact reason for the kick/ban. Don't be vague. 4) Do not take things personally, do not be bias or one sided. Keep an open mind and remember this is a public server. There will always be clowns and trolls just don't let them get to you and try not to let it stress you out. 5) You may use the warning system in EasyAdmin, sometimes when it's busy and you see something minor, it's easier to shoot them a warning message (with a clear explanation) and move on to the next call or issue. Remember on the third warning it auto kicks. 6) Don't stress about a bunch of admin calls coming in. Get to them when you can. Many times you will solve more problems and issues simply by being vigilant while no clipping around or spectating players. Balance and teamwork is key. 7) Most importantly, keep your cool and remain polite/professional with everyone you encounter. There will be many people who will test your patience and try to get a rise out of you. Don't let them win.
Keep up the tremendous work you all are doing and don't forget the majority of members appreciate the hell out of you being there! Thanks.
11

101 | Hyperion 07/01/2021 8:45 AM
[ New Staff Commands ] As many of you have been requesting admin revive and admin unlock they have both been added to the server. With that said these commands are ONLY to be used while staffing and NOT in roleplay. Anyone caught abusing these commands will be disciplined, demoted or the commands will be removed. The commands will be available for Senior Moderators+ so that they will be available to more of the team. The commands have been added to #deleted-channel and are as follows:
Admin Revive: To be used ONLY while staffing to instantly revive from RDM/VDM on staff. This is NEVER to be used in RP. The command is: /adrev
Admin Unlock: To be used to unlock locked vehicles which have been abandoned and will not delete via delgun. (currently works on vehicles locked via "K" lock, we will be working to get it working on vehicles which have been locked via /lock as well.) The command is: /adlock (while directly next to a vehicle)
Give a big thanks to @Zooma! (edited)
101 | Hyperion 07/01/2021 9:34 AM
[ New Staff Command ] Also, For your convince the command /tp <ID> should be in and working after the next restart. It will tp you to the player in question. Other quick commands being looked into are: /spectate <ID> /freeze <ID>

101 | Hyperion 07/02/2021 7:28 AM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Actions In Server ] Gentlemen, This is a friendly reminder that goofing off and screwing around in AOP is not desirable or allowed while you are staffing. I understand that we all like to mess around and have some fun at times when it's not busy as staffing is quite stressful. However it MUST take place out of AOP. This is gaming community and I'm all for you guys having a bit of fun on your down time while staffing as long as it's out of sight of the general members. Today we received complaints from members in server about staff screwing around, playing music (which can be considered mic spam) and not answering calls. Again, I can appreciate the hilarity of it however if seen in AOP again it will result in suspensions. Think of it as a mullet... Business in the front (AOP) and Party in the back (out of AOP) If you would like to play some music with civs (no n words in it) you may get creative and host a party somewhere out of the way when you are offduty. I personally spawn in the party bus from time to time and park it in areas like cochela or the satellite dishes and hold a small concert there so it does not interfere with other roleplay. In conclusion be professional when in the public eye. Thanks. - (edited)

101 | Hyperion 07/03/2021 6:23 PM
[ Server Event Details ]
The following is posted in the #📅・events channel. I'd like to ask all staff who are available to meet 20min prior to the start to help set up and go over details.
In reference to the fire works script we have, the command is /sf to place a box of fireworks. The box will shoot fireworks for about a min straight. You can set multiple boxes which we will tomorrow. I would like to ask that staff DO NOT USE the script prior to the event so that we can preserve it until the show. Following the event staff can use the script to continue to set fireworks shows around the server for the rest of the evening (do not set them off in the middle of a road or somewhere like the PD or something stupid. if it's abused in some way I will turn off the script.
- 4th of July Block Party Details of Event Date: July 4th 2021 Time: 7:00PM EST Location: Del Perro Pier - Postal 8000 (At the end of the pier)
What's Happening ➤ To celebrate Independence Day with our members, the Server Staff and Events Team along with Certified Civilians will be hosting a small block party complete with food trucks, music, a beer cart along with a large fireworks display and Blue Angles flyover!!
Details ➤This will be a completely PASSIVE event, no weapons or criminal role play allowed. We will hangout as friends and celebrate the 4th of July in style. Feel free to use your best patriotic civilian clothing which is available in the MP player.

Charlie S. 07/08/2021 4:25 PM
Stability Issues Evening all, I am here to put to light the issues with our Dedicated Server, that have since just been fixed. Here is our take of it. Over the last couple of weeks, there were some unbeknown stability issues occuring to the Community's Dedicated Server, that we thought was a glitch in the TXAdmin system, displaying 100% CPU Usage. With no major issues being shown on the Server, we just let it be. After today's instability, I looked further into this, and found what seemed to be a "bug" in the system, with a random process using 90% of the Server's CPU... Since that process was killed, TXAdmin is now showing the Server as stable once again. With that in mind, I ask that if you notice any instabilities with the Server, at any time, for any reason, please directly contact Zooma or I, so a swift fix can be made. Whether it be from mass crashses, to major loss of frames, let us know. We won't bite, it's our job. Cheers guys, have a great rest of your night! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S.
SARP - @SARP | Server Staff

Charlie S. 07/09/2021 9:40 PM
A Thank You Some of you may be aware of the events of today, however, some may not, so I'll put some light on it. At roughly 15:50 British Summer Time, the Server's FTP (where all Server Resources are ran) experienced a major security breach, by what we believe to be a virus, which has since been removed (we hope). This "Virus" caused one of our main directories, containing many key resources for the Server's operation, to be deleted, hence the Server immediately crashing, and the downtime of over 5 Hours. Over this time, I immediately reached out to the available Development Team online at the time, who helped us spring right into action on getting the Server back to its feet. I would like to give a huge thank you to @Zooma, @Archie, @Chizza, @486 | ofekiii, @Mr. Hadi, and others! If not for their hard-work, the Server's downtime would have been extradinant. With that in mind, to give back for these efforts, we will be giving the following rewards to these fine gentlemen!
@Archie, @486 | ofekiii, @Mr. Hadi - 31 Days of Royal V.I.P. @Chizza - A fine treasure to be received for his Gang (maybe two weeks?)
Thank you all for your hard-work, this was the least we could do! I ask you to help me in thanking them. Have a great night & weekend! Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S.
SARP - @SARP | Server Staff

101 | Hyperion 07/18/2021 6:18 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff RTO Policy Change ] All, It was clear by the vote that the entirety of the team would like some priority commands to be accessible outside of staff RTO. While I agree this makes a lot of sense since persons in staff RTO generally don't know when a priority is occurring, I would still like to lay some ground rules. The following commands may be used by staff members who are in role play as LEO or FD without the need to join staff RTO for approval. This will help identify when priorities are occurring and when they are not.
/inprogress - Priority in Progress May be used when LEO/FD units are engaged in a priority call.
/cooldown - Enable Priority cool down Use to set a cool down timer after a priority has ended. Average cool down should be 10, 15 or 20min MAX
/resetpcd - Reset's Priority cool down Used to reset priority in progress or cool down only if needed
All other commands should be reserved for use in staff RTO only and by approval of the highest on. This includes /priorityhold which puts a hold on all priorities until removed. Also remember that cool down may be used when staff place peacetime into effect as well. What I DO NOT want..
- No one is to refer to the commands in RTO or discuss them in RTO as this ruins the realism. Poke or 10-1 if you want to discuss an issue with priority commands.
- There are to be no disputes over the use of the priority commands, toggling on or off for personal gain or bickering over cool down lengths. Show your maturity, discuss it if needed in 10-1.
- Keep in mind that the highest LEO in RTO may 10-22 any scene or priority for various reasons, that is their right by rank, you are not to argue with them. Active dispatch may also 10-22 a priority if one has just occurred.
- Priorities should have a MINIMUM of 10min in between them. This back to back, constant priority mess needs to stop.
I know this seems a bit over complicated but it really isn't. It's very simple, turn it on when there's a priority, set cool down when it's over. We will give it a go for a week or so and see how it works out. I hope it helps to space out our priorities a bit more. If you have any questions feel free to post in #deleted-channel Thanks. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 07/19/2021 4:41 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Names & ID numbers? ] All recently we've had multiple people changing their names without advising us. This causes issues and confusion when trying to identify who is who on the staff team and in game. Please refer to the below section which has been pasted from the guidelines.
All members of the Staff Team must have one set name while staffing. You may have your departmental name, or your normal discord name. However they must always match in the main discord and in game while staffing. If you are on as a LEO, FD, or any other department you must have your call-sign, and department name in use while in teamspeak. If you return to staff you must return to the name set as your nickname in the main discord unless you are going by your department name all the time. Example: My discord name is Hyperion, while i'm staffing my in game and TS name should also be Hyperion so that I can be identified in the discord as staff. When I go on duty as an LEO I must change my TS name to my LEO name: 101 | Hendrix S.
Also, Some of you have brought up or requested staff call signs as a means to identify staff in game and match them to the discord. This may not be the best solution, however since it's been mentioned several times. I will allow you guys to vote your opinion on staff call-signs. This does not mean the result will go into effect but if the majority want it, it will be discussed. These "call signs" would not necessarily be used verbally in RTO, these would simply be identification numbers displayed in game and in the main discord to help identify you as staff. These would replace your department call signs in the main discord only. Possible example of staff IDs format. CM-1 | Hyperion HA-2 | Casey K SA-5 | Blitsog A-3 | Ofekiii SM-1 | Dom T. M-14 | Owen P. TM-8 | Josh C. - Vote your opinion below.

101 | Hyperion 07/21/2021 2:19 AM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Ban Lengths Updated ] All, As most of you know by now, easyadmin now allows for banning for 6hrs at a time. To work this into our system the ban lengths have been adjusted and updated in the #deleted-channel channel and in #deleted-channel for you to review. While 6hrs may not sound long, it will only be used for minor and common role play violations. I believe it may be useful and more practical for these minor violations in which you deem the behavior or response from the player to justify a short ban. I think the 6hr ban may be a sweet spot for minor violations where it is long enough that most undesirable players wont return for the day but frequent players may return later in the day which helps keep the server active. The more serious, major and malicious bans and their lengths have not changed. I also went through the server rule document and added multiple new offenses that had not been listed prior to this. The info is laid out very simply in the format below. Tier I Offences ➤ Minor RP Violations ➤ Warning/Kick/6hr Ban Tier II Offences ➤ Serious RP Violations ➤ Warning/Kick/1-3 Day Ban Tier III Offences ➤ Major RP Violations ➤ Warning/Kick/7, 14, 30 Day Ban Tier IV Offences ➤ Malicious Violations ➤ Permanent Ban You still have a lot of discretion and options when it comes to how minimal or strict you want to be with your punishments as long as you keep it within the limits of the tier max ban time/day. Remember punishment should be based on the offense and the response the player gives. Example: minor violation and player is mature and takes responsibility, they may receive a lower punishment or warning. If the player is immature, or argumentative then feel free to use the max punishment allowed. If you have any input regarding ban lengths I am always willing to listen feel free to DM me and I will consider it. If the 6hr ban proves to not be effective we will revert back. Thanks. (edited)
2

If you weren't promoted this round please keep working at it as maturity and work ethic will be rewarded! Thanks. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 07/21/2021 3:41 AM
[ Few Updates ] All, Last announcement of the night, I swear.. First, if you were wondering what the issue was with teamspeak today I will explain. Last night we found several critical security flaws in our teamspeak permissions that needed to be fixed asap. I got with Thompson and asked him to give it a healthy once over to lock it down so that no further vulnerabilities could be exploited in the future. As most of you know Thompson is a teamspeak specialist and did exactly that! However it was my fault for not passing on how we desired our staff permissions and other things laid out so there was some confusion after permissions were tightened.
Some things that were fixed: - No one can edit/assign or remove roles above their own. - Management can no longer create TS access keys. - Only authorized individuals can edit/create channels. - Multiple other server group/channel issues fixed. Kick/Ban Perms Fixed - Admin+ can kick/perma ban - Senior Moderators can kick/ban for 72hrs - Moderators can kick/ban for 24hrs - Trial Moderators can Kick Disclaimer We gave you guys ban permissions because there are times where there are only moderators in RTO. If you can ban in game you should be able to ban in TS to stop trolls. However, if this is EVER abused the permissions will be removed. Roles: Admin+ should be able to give most roles under themselves. Senior Mods and Mods should be able to give most non-supervisor ranks below them. Remember that department HC members can give higher department roles when requested as they are responsible for their department’s roles.
The overall security level of the TS server is now much stronger and if you have ever been through a troll who exploits permissions and causes havoc on a server you will appreciate this. Big shout out to @218 | Neptune for his work today. Also, @Zooma has been working on a female staff vest which is almost done. Expect it in server soon.
Final note, as we hit 3k discord members and 70 staff members on the team in such a short time frame, I want to thank you all for your hard work and time given to the success of the server. We would not be this far along at this point if it wasnt for all of you guys. Be proud of what you and the server have accomplished. I am excited to see what the future holds for SARP!
Thanks. (edited)

102 | Alex M. 07/22/2021 1:03 PM
[ Staff Removal ] Good afternoon fellow staff team, I am here to notify and educate you on a situation that had happened here recently. As we all know we are starting to gain more members as the days go on. When it comes to these members, not all of them are men or males in this case. We have gained women players in the past few weeks and I want to say personally, that I am extremely disappointed in the way that they have been treated from the staff team as a whole. As a staff team we must remain professional at all times no matter what, and from what has been brought to my attention this individual has broke professionalism in a multitude of ways towards females. We must treat not only females, but every player within the community with the same level of respect. As we go on, if there is anymore reported cases involving professionalism with a female, severe action will be taken. As of right now, Tom N. has been terminated from the community as a whole for the reasons listed below. -Interacting with a female in a inappropriate and unprofessional way. -Calling this female inappropriate names such as baby, princess, baby girl, good girl, etc. -Interacting with a female knowing she is 3 years younger than you. -Breaking community T.O.S. I know that this is extremely transparent. This is mostly a learning lesson for you guys, and going on the future can take note of this situation right here. In the case that you feel you are being manipulated or harassed by not only a female, but another member within the community be sure to bring it up to the management team as soon as possible whether that be dm's or within a staff support ticket. This will allow us to take action of that situation quicker and hope it doesn't spark out to end up like this one. I expect ALL to react with once they have read this fully and thoroughly. Signed, Community Owner | Alex M. (edited)

101 | Hyperion pinned a message to this channel. 07/23/2021 6:04 AM
101 | Hyperion 07/23/2021 4:10 PM
[ Management RTO ] Just a quick clarification. Some of you have asked what the purpose of management rto is. Quite simply, myself and Zooma tend to sit in general/welcome lounges when we are available but not necessarily in server. Also If we go down to our offices no one knows we're there. So, if you see one of us sitting in management rto it means we are available if needed but not necessarily in server. It's also a place to drag people to if a private conversation is needed other than the channel separators. If we are staffing we will likely move down to normal RTO. Thanks. (edited)
3
101 | Hyperion 07/23/2021 11:13 PM
[ Server Events ] @SARP | Server Staff @SARP | Events Team All, Going forth all server events should be held outside of the current AOP. If the server event needs to occupy a space, please coordinate with the onduty staff to ensure the current AOP does not conflict. AOP may need to be changed for a short time.
If we are state wide, remember that a large number of those in server will be involved in the event so shrinking the AOP is fine while the event is on going.
Why should it be held out of AOP? Because server events may not always follow normal RP rules as they are "special events" which may fall outside of normal roleplay. We also want to separate (as best we can) those in the event from those not participating in the event. If there happens to be some slight overlap between the AOP and the event, events staff should make every effort to avoid conflicts and take actions to lessen any impact on members trying to roleplay in AOP. Remember everyone is different, some enjoy the events while other enjoy roleplay. Neither should hinder the other.
9
101 | Hyperion 07/24/2021 12:13 AM
@SARP | Server Staff [ Gang Roleplay while on as Staff ] 1. On duty staff are not allowed to roleplay as a gang member while staffing. Staff can only passively RP when it's slow or the server has low player count. Gang RP is not considered passive RP. If this continues we will no longer allow any RP while on duty as staff. 2. If you are RP'ing as a gang member and violate a server rule (interfering with a on going rp scene that you did not initiate) you are subject to punishment. You guys enforce the rules, if you then violate them you become part of the problem and it will effect your status on the team. You guys get a lot of leeway and flexibility, don't abuse it. Thanks. (edited)

1
101 | Hyperion 07/26/2021 9:39 AM
[ Entity Logs... I say again... Entity Logs!! ] All, Some of you have likely noticed we now have working entity logs! YES you heard that right! According to Zooma his entity logs will detect over 53k different types of spawned entities. Now like with any entity log/script it will not confirm a modder nor will it only show modders. The log will show a mass of entities being spawned in that MAY be suspicious. If you have a modder in game, check the log and see if it shows anything recently being spawned. If the answer is yes, screenshot and spectate that individual to try and confirm. Some items will be removed slowly to trim down false activations, such as the seagull, cigar etc...
Do not ban someone based on this log alone, make sure you back it up with other evidence to confirm.
Everyone please give @Zooma a big shout out for this great benefit to the team! Thanks. (edited)
6
Charlie S. 07/26/2021 3:21 PM
Public Officer Uniforms Evening all. As part of the Public Officer program, we are no longer permitting the use of Custom Uniforms. Therefore, all Uniforms must be default to the /pubcop Command, and Officers may use the Female Ped, if they so please. This was permitted by myself on a case-by-case, a few months ago, however, was soon stopped as this permissions was severly abused, and created some pretty wacky uniforms. I.e - From this point on, no-one should be permitting the use of Custom Uniforms for Community Officer's. Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S.
SARP - Staff Team

6
101 | Hyperion 07/27/2021 10:06 PM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ Staff Activity Policy ] ALL STAFF MUST REVIEW This is a fast growing team with a lot of talent, because of this we can not allow staff members to fall inactive and maintain their current ranks. However all staff will be given every opportunity to improve and step up to the plate. I know this is not an issue for many of you, however this will outline the policy and I want everyone to be aware of it. The following has been added to staff guidelines: Inactivity is defined in this case as "not meeting minimum hourly requirement" ➤ Inactivity Policy:
Head Administrators: (Must remain active and complete assigned tasks) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity, may face demotion to senior administrator. - 3rd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal. Senior Administrator: (20hrs a month, 15hrs if in department staff or high command) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity, will result in demotion to Administrator. - 3rd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal. Administrator: (20hrs a month, 5hrs a week) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity, will result in demotion to Senior Moderator. - 3rd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal Senior Moderator: (20hrs a month, 5hrs a week) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity, will result in demotion to Moderator. - 3rd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal. Moderator: (20hrs a month, 5hrs a week) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity will result in a strike. - 3rd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal Trial Moderator: (20hrs a month, 5hrs a week) - 1st month of inactivity will result in a warning via DM or announcement. - 2nd month of inactivity (in a row), will result in removal
➤ This system allows for 90 days total (3 months) before a staff member (with the exception of trial moderators) is actually removed from the team. This allows ample time for anyone on the team to bring their hours back into good standing. Those who are demoted can be promoted again if their hours/dedication have improved and meet standards. ➤ Those who have not met the minimum requirements for 60+ days may not take LOA to prevent being removed from the team. If you have not been active for two straight months AND request an LOA it is time to reevaluate your commitment to the team. ➤ Those who are high command may elect to transfer to the reserve unit as long as they remain active within their department. ➤ Those not meeting the minimum hourly requirement will be labeled “Low” in the activity section of the roster. Thank you all for the amount of hours you dedicate to the server, your service ensures our success each day! Thanks. Hyper SARP | Community Management (edited)
21
Zooma 07/28/2021 1:13 AM
[ @SARP | Server Staff ] [ New Scam Links ] ➤ Hello, everyone once again I wanted to remind you guys about the new type of scam link going around to do with Discord nitro. https://gyazo.com/fd29acc8ac088344cbc2270c4cbd58b7 ➤ The image below is a photo of the link that was posted throughout the entire Discord. I noticed some of you neglected it maybe not knowing of the links intent. DO NOT CLICK THESE instead please follow the same process as the old steam hack links which is as the following.
Reporting it to a @deleted-role member for the user to be banned/muted. Reporting the Link to a management + member for blacklisting with the following format below. I will use the above link as an example.
Scam Link: dicsord.site Note: We would not like to see the entire link we would just like a portion of it which would normally be the main domain name as the / after dicsord.site/ is always subject to be changeable. Thanks for your co-operation Zooma SARP | Management Team (edited)
Gyazo

This is highly suspect and could very well be a large number of bots. All staff should be vigilant of general chat and all of the public channels for any suspicious links. Also please report any spam or DMs so that @deleted-role can quickly deal with them. Thanks.

4
101 | Hyperion 07/29/2021 1:21 AM
[ Malicious Links ] All, To better protect the discord and our members against the increasing amount of spam/token grabber links, we have started using a new bot that removes all links in public channels. This will be tested over the next few days and will hopefully prevent link posting by bots or other hacked accounts. Currently all open/public channels are protected. Staff can still post gifs and links in any channel and VIP members can post links/gifs in #💬・donator-chat. Other than that the main discord should be locked down. You should still of course be vigilant against anything suspicious, advertisements or DMs that contain any links. Links that are deleted will show up highlighted in red on the left side in #🔷・discord-edits Thanks. (edited)

Over the past months Flander has been responsible for helping build many departments, teams and sections in the server. Including building rosters, SOPs, discords or developing liveries.. Flander has helped to build SACD, Events Team, Certified Civilians, SADOT, Civ Gangs as well as being in BCSO as a Lieutenant while also being in Staff Team, Support Team and Development Team. The amount of work he has put into the success of this server is outstanding, appreciated and does not go unnoticed! Please join me in pinging him in staff chat to congratulate him!

Administrators have proven themselves ready to take on a supervisory role within the team and are tasked with leading and teaching new staff to ensure their proficiency. Charlie S. 07/31/2021 5:17 PM
PocceMod Admin "Prop" Menu
Good evenings all, I want to make our Admin's+ aware of our new Admin Menu, holding the opportunity for Prop placing, amongst a range of other features.
PocceMod Information
⌨️ Keybind Click "F11" to Activate! Key Features - Spawn Props & Companions (pets & parties), Trash Peds & Cars, and Autopilot & TP Into closest Vehicle ❔ Key Points - Spawning Ped Parties will require you to use F1 "Clear Area" in order to remove these Peds. - Spawning Props will require you to use the PocceMenu "Clearall" or "Clearlast" options, under the "Prop" Category.
Final Notes
This type of script has been suggested for a while, and has been in debate to whether it should, or shouldn't, be added to the Game Server. With that in mind, we do hold a significant amount of trust in you to not abuse these Permissions, and any reports of abuse will be dealt with. Please use this sensibly, to benefit Roleplay, not hinder it! To add onto this & for reference, Prop Spawning must be used in a realisitc way & within Roleplay. As for one example; Spawning Speaker's, Benches, etc, whilst in the Area of Roleplay, must be taken out of a storage carrier, such as a truck.
Signed, Community Owner - Charlie S.
San Andreas Roleplay - @SARP | Administrator @SARP | Senior Administrator @SARP | Head Administrator

101 | Hyperion 08/02/2021 10:46 PM
[ Deleted Links Log ] All, I have created a log channel that displays a message whenever someone posts a link in the public channels. This warning would normally go into the channel where the link was posted, however to help us identity those sending spam links i've redirected it to a single log channel #deleted-channel. Please note that not all deleted links will be spam or grabber links, they may simply be a member trying to post a gif or something else. However if you see multiple messages deleted (4-5+) at one time it will likely be a bot/hacked account sending links. Once you notice this please search the discord ID in #🔷・discord-edits to see what they are posting and confirm it. If it is confirmed to be a malicious link please ban or post their info in #deleted-channel. Thanks! Examples Below: (edited)
