101 | Hyperion 02/08/2022 2:44 AM
[ Staff Rooms for Staff Sits ] All, Per a request, staff now has two channels in the Member Support section of the discord in which they can drag players into that wish to screen share evidence regarding an in game issue.
・Staff Room #1 ・Staff Room #2
This was suggested to help avoid general members joining the member lounges while staff are trying to speak to someone regarding a staff call. These channels are restricted to staff and you may drag them in from the "Requesting Staff" waiting room. If you happen to see a member in there go ahead and see if you can address their issue/question. If they are not used they will be removed. Enjoy! (edited)
10
101 | Hyperion 02/09/2022 1:32 AM
[ Operation: "Red Shield" ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Today marks the start of an initiate to which I have lovingly named operation red shield. This staff initiative is a concerted effort on the part of staff to highly focus on the roleplay scenes of public safety departments in the server such as LEO and FD. Why? A constant issue for LEOs and FD, more so for LEO, is individuals interfering with scenes such as traffic stops and other 911 calls which causes them to become frustrated, burned out and in the end less active. What kinda of interference? The type of interference i'm speaking of are those who, either by ignorance of the rules or by a desire to troll, choose to constantly pull up to traffic stops and other scenes to either cop bait or just plain annoy those working the scene. They also deal with obvious RDM/VDM on a daily basis. How do we handle this? Well i'm glad you asked. We as staff should be very attentive to LEO's/FD and their scenes. You should be no clipping around the server looking for LEOS/FD units on scenes and simply watch the scene in no clip. We want those in emergency services to a able to roleplay as realistic as possible without the constant interference of those not involved in the scene. RDM/VDM should be handled immediately as you normally would. When do I take action? When you come across a scene, quietly watch for those who are pulling up to the scene and not leaving or backing away when LEOs ask them to. Also watch for individuals who cop bait (point guns without any prior roleplay, spin tires over and over again, constantly yell absurd comments, follow officers continuously etc...) Also watch for those asking unrealistic questions, making threating statements that interfere with the current scene. What do I do? One thing we DO NOT want to do is un-noclip and stop the scene if we do not have to. Your first step should be using the built in easyadmin warning system which when used correctly very blatantly makes the player aware of what they should not be doing. On the third warning they are kicked. We also need to make sure to articulate a good message in the warning such as "Please do not interfere with a scene that you are not apart of." or "Cop baiting is not allowed, please do not continue to follow the officer" What if the warning does not work? If they do not respond to the warning, and you have verified that they are in fact not apart of the scene and are interfering with it, simply TP them to you, away from the scene and explain to them what they have done wrong. Take whatever actions you feel are needed from that point on. Do not go ban happy on people that were simply not aware of the rule. What else? Also watch for members following vehicle pursuits around the map like some sort of parade, this is completely unrealistic and needs to be stopped. Get their member number, warn them or TP them to you and instruct them to stop. Conclusion In conclusion we are the "guardian angels" of our whitelisted members, we should be watching their backs so to speak against this type of thing just as you would desire if you were roleplaying. This effort should always be the standard, not just for this week however this week and weekend we are going to hyper focus on it in an effort to make a positive influence on game play. Remember, trolls are attracted to emergency lights like a moth to a flame, by doing this you are going to help improve the overall playability of the server. God's speed to you all, I will be partaking as well! Hyper (edited)

5

101 | Hyperion 02/10/2022 7:16 PM
[ #deleted-channel ] All, Not sure if the server is simply functioning extremely well or folks aren't sure how to use the channel anymore. Basically to better track server glitches and issues I instituted a ticket system along with the board at the top of the channel. The ticket embed explains what constitutes making a ticket and what not to create a ticket for. Once you create a ticket it will be addressed, added to the list and the board on in the channel. Once the issue is resolved the ticket will be closed. Please check the server issues board to see if the issue has already been reported. If it has the ticket will be closed. Thanks!
101 | Hyperion 02/11/2022 3:50 PM
[ Moderation Promotions ] All, Few moderator promotions this afternoon. 101 | Hyperion 02/14/2022 10:02 AM
[ Rule Update ] All, Please note the addition of the following to the #📌・server-rules.
5.08 - No member shall engage in rioting or protesting roleplay for political, social or any other reason unless approved by management for a specific event.
This likely should have been restricted prior to this but was not. This type of roleplay unfortunately got multiple people kicked/banned two nights ago to the point where I had to announce to the entire server that it would no longer be allowed in game. In a perfect world this type of roleplay would be feasible however in a public server it just invites mass players to commit mass violations over and over again. It also seriously disrupts the server for everyone else in the area. During the shit show the other night the highway in Paleto kept being blocked off over and over again, which attracted multiple instances of RDM/VDM on those involved. Then a group of individuals felt it was ok to run into the police department to continue to yell into their mics to protest inside. This was also quickly stopped as PD is a green zone. After that, they chose to protest by following/chasing and crashing into a community officer while yelling at him over and over during peacetime which bordered member harassment as he had asked them to stop multiple times. Every single individual involved in that was kicked from the server for violating PT. This included several department members. Please educate those who are not aware of the rule update, those who choose not to follow it may be disciplined. This will fall under "Restricted Roleplay" for bans.
101 | Hyperion 02/15/2022 12:09 PM
[ Lockdown Commands ] All, The lockdown function has been updated/fixed.
Use: /lockdown (Locks all publicly accessible channels.) Use: /lockdown end (Opens all publicly accessible channels)
Only use this command in the event of a mass trolling incident. The bot should stop most mass trolling incidents but this is available if all else fails. If you have several people "fighting" simply mute them please. (edited)

Charlie S. 02/19/2022 2:16 PM

Cheers Update - We believe it may be in correlation with the Number of MLOs in the Game Server, please remain patient as we mitigate the issue, by removing Maps & finding the sweet spot of stopping the Pool Size Error. Thanks (edited)

101 | Hyperion 02/22/2022 1:24 PM
[ Staff Activity ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, This being the last week of the month I wanted to encourage you guys that haven't already reached your required 15hrs a month to try and put the time in. Staff hours and LEO hours were lowered across the board to give everyone a little bit of breathing room. I know this time of the year is filled with exams and other personal requirements but we must enforce our minimum hourly requirement. Many of you are qualified for promotions but may not be meeting your hourly requirement. Please know this could hold you back. Those of you who were low activity last month will be warned one last time at the end of this month if you again fail to meet the requirement. You will have one more month to bring your hours up before demotions/removals may occur at x3 months low hours. On the bright side, I have noticed many times of 5-6 staff on at a time working together and getting it done. I appreciate you guys! Thanks, Hyper

4
101 | Hyperion 02/23/2022 1:44 AM
[ Interfering with Live Streams ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Some of you may know that a somewhat popular streamer was in the server for a while today. While the title of his stream was "trolling" related he didn't really troll and was simply trying to have some fun/funny roleplay. I applaud the staff that were at some of his scenes for being professional. However I noticed something that was quite upsetting overall. This was the amount of people that chose to stream snipe him and interfere with his role play for most of this time in the server. At one point there were approximately 8-10 people chasing him down all over the place yelling out of character while crashing into him. For this reason I'm going to make a slight adjustment to our "Trolling a Live Stream" ban. When staff knows a main stream or well known streamer is in game, please watch over them (not the whole team at once, preferably the highest ranking staff member on at the time.) to help stop any trolling/interfering with his stream. Do not take actions against the streamer unless they break an obvious server rule and always stay in no clip far enough away to not be noticed. What I do want you to do is issue EasyAdmin warnings to those who are CONTINUOUSLY following, chasing, yelling and interfering with the streamer. Allow people to come up and roleplay with them of course, however it will become obvious when someone is there simply to "stream snipe" and get on the stream. If they do not respond, TP them away from the stream and tell them to stop, if they do not listen you may kick them or ban them for up to 6hrs. With that said, please review the changes to the ban reasons/lengths below. These will be updated in guidelines shortly. Try your best not to freeze people around the streamer or un-noclip if at all possible so that you as staff do not also interfere with the stream if you don't have to.
Interfering with a SARP (approved) streamer = 14 Day Ban max (This is for members of the media team who are approved SARP streamers and create content for the server specifically.) Interfering with a streamer (Outside Streamer) = 6hr ban max (This is for main stream or well known streamers who happen to come into the server and are live but are not members of the SARP media team.)
To be clear you may still warn or kick before enforcing bans however these are your limits if you choose that a ban is justified. Hopefully this will help in the future as I hated seeing him have to leave the server due to the "parade" of idiots following him everywhere. For those of you who know or do not know, this streamer is former staff for SACRP and knows what staff should do and how they should conduct themselves. At one point he was asked to remove red from his name, as he relogged he defended the staff member on his stream for "just doing their job" which was nice to see. He also called staff on the server "try hards" which I take as a compliment that you guys have your shit together and are serious about doing your jobs. However lets also remember it is a game and sometimes it pays off to be flexible with players. Thanks. Hyper. (edited)

Charlie S. 02/27/2022 11:27 AM
| Write a Review About San Andreas Roleplay A very good afternoon from here in the UK, I hope you are all well & healthy. For those that may have seen a recent FiveM Update, Members of Community's can now review specific Server's, with their own personalised review! Therefore, we ask for 10-Minutes of your time. Reviewing San Andreas Roleplay
➤ Reviewing, especially for some, does come as an easy task. Specifically pointing my fingers at individuals who are banned, and out of spite, create biased & unfair reviews, creating a negative shadow towards our Community. To whom, for the most part, have a playtime of 15-Minutes... ➤ To dilute these pointless & unhelpful reviews, I ask for your help! I am contacting some of the most prestigous, respected, and fundamental protectors of our Community, to provide purely honest reviews of the San Andreas Roleplay Game Server. Thus allowing our Community to sustain growth, expanding our horizons to new members, who may have orignally been turnt away, due to pointless & unhelpful reviews.
If you are feeling generous enough in helping us compile a series of honest & honourable reviews for the Game Server, I do ask that you follow the steps below, so you, can write one yourself! Steps to Provide a Review
[ 1 ] - Open the FiveM Application, and Login to a Cfx.re Account, if an account needs to be created, a direct link to an Account Creation Page can be found in the Top Right Hand Corner, of the application. [ 2 ] - Locate the San Andreas Roleplay Server on the Server List, Click & Open our home page. [ 3 ] - To create a Review, you will need to Scroll to the Bottom of our Media Feed, to which you will find "Write a Review About San Andreas Roleplay" [ 4 ] - From here, a Review can be formulated with a Title & a Review Itself! [ 5 ] - To Submit, Click "Post Review"
Of-course, this is completely optional, however, I thank you for your time. Have a wonderful Week. See you shortly! Signed, Community Management
San Andreas Roleplay - @SARP | Server Staff

181 | Alex 🚑 03/02/2022 8:03 PM
[ Banned Areas Of AOP] All, As you may now, sometimes we can ban certain areas of AOP when they become too crowded or chaotic. When setting certain AOP's like Blaine County [Sandy Banned] please keep in mind this is meant to be temporary. By banning major areas of AOP like Sandy Shores in Blaine County or even Legion Square in Los Santos, we can effectively force players to spread out of the area. We need to only do this for at least 20 minutes maximum at a time! Leaving an area banned for too long causes all of those players once grouped up, to just do it again in another area. When too many people are in an area, it creates stress on the server, lag for certain individuals (even crashes), and even worse RP. If you set an area to be banned, please keep in mind the time you set it for and unban within the 20 minute time frame. Once unbanned, you might notice certain people slowly move back to the area. With people moving around the map, it helps strengthen RP, causes less interference in good RP, and keeps everyone happy! Thank you all for your understanding! Keep up the good work on staffing. Please leave a ️ to let me know you read and understand this announcement. Sincerely, @181 | Alex 🚑 @SARP | Server Staff (edited)

[ Poolsize Update ] To keep you guys in the loop. For those who were not present for the test last night, I ended up taking the server down to zero interiors, stock server, as far as maps go and we were still able to replicate the poolsize attachment crash after a restart. So the hunt continues to find the possible culprit. It does seem that this really ramped up and began around 01/17/22. Keep your fingers crossed as we narrow in on the cause. Hyper. (edited)

Zooma 03/03/2022 1:36 PM
[ New LOA Command ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] As I am the goodest developer we now have a LOA command for the discord. I will show you some examples on how to use it below to get you all started with basics. [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/i04sv1xvrr4i0t7s980.png ] Here you can see there are 2 commands loa start and loa end [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/erzv7ec1uz7vdmjezzfh.png ] If you lets say wanted to start an LOA for today and end it tomorrow. You would follow the format like the image above. MAKE SURE YOU USE THE AMERICAN FORMAT OF MM/DD/YYYY If you ignore this you will get a reminder too early. [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/4zmxjayj8gwbxcpagmk.png ] After you have entered your dates and reason for the LOA it will be put up for approval. You shall wait for a head admin + to approve or deny your LOA. [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/wdi7qbasth4f03s.png ] Once your LOA has been approved the approve/deny buttons will disappear and there will be a tick reaction + a new edit LOA button. This button can only be ran by the person who created the LOA to edit their end date. [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/q18thwsaaz4bvsw7.png ] [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/j72jdrtagysxv1zjy6d8ait.png ] In these 2 images this is what you will see when editing your LOA. It will ask for the new end date and reason for LOA change. Once you have submitted these 2 options. it will be re-added for approval just as before. [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/bpsfzksnlqqggmm6ol7f99.png ] [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/ctorilm7uygoocipy1thzauv.png ] Upon ending your LOA you have the option to submit a reason for an early LOA. ( if this doesn't apply you don't have to add it ) [ https://ss.zooma.codes/images/shzc2uin2s2fwccorhrlmscy.png ] Simply add your reason and it will be added and your LOA will end. ~ Zooma
Zooma Has Caught You In 4K
Zooma Has Caught You In 4K
Zooma Has Caught You In 4K
Zooma Has Caught You In 4K
Zooma Has Caught You In 4K

101 | Hyperion 03/03/2022 5:14 PM
[ VPN Blocker ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Will be running a little test starting today and through the weekend with the venom VPN blocker turned off. Many people try to play the server daily but cant due to the blocker. In the past this was highly desirable to help limit DDOS attempts and other undesirable things, however since switching to a much more resilient and stable host, we may be fine overall with lifting the VPN ban. I would ask that staff be extra aware of any large amounts of successful modders and of course notify us if any DDOS'ing is noticed. We may see a bit larger player base as well. Thanks, Hyper.

101 | Hyperion 03/05/2022 8:42 AM
[ Poolsize Error FIXED! ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, I am so happy to announce that the big brains got together this morning and thanks to everyone there, we appear to have located the cause of the poolsize error and resolved it! It appears the electronic highway signs were broken and were causing it all along. Since being removed we have not experienced the pool size error. I would ask that if you do experience it, which you shouldn't, please post it immediately in #deleted-channel. Thanks!

115 | Isaac Z. 03/12/2022 8:39 PM
[ Staff Suspension ] All, In the interest of transparency, @Deleted User has been placed on a 7 day Administrative Leave for breach of staff guidelines: Zero Tolerance Guidelines:
3) No Staff Team Member shall break Server rules found in the server rules channel.
In Game Guidelines:
18) Staff members are never to interfere with an ongoing roleplay scene unless serious server rules are being violated and’or a person within the roleplay calls for a staff member.
Being a member of the staff team does not give you the right to do whatever you want in-game, all rules still apply to you, especially in times of high activity, and during events. No staff member should be interfering with a server event unless they are the ones supervising said event. Nor should anyone not part of a department participate in that department's event. Normally I would not include exact details, but because I feel this was a pretty severe breach of conduct I will outright say it: No staff member should be RDM'ing members in an event, and be pretending to be part of said event to do so. This was very close to a termination. Thanks.
25
101 | Hyperion 03/13/2022 12:28 PM
[ GreenZones ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, - Big News!!! We now have the ability to set togglable green zones aka small areas of peacetime in areas of the server that are prone to chaos. This command will be for senior moderator+ and will allow you to toggle on/off specified areas to help control the chaos and clear folks out without having to ban the area near as much. For example, instead of banning sandy when it's mass failrp, constant shooting and VDM. You may turn on sandy shores as a green zone for a short time to calm the area down. This will still allow members to passive roleplay in it but not shoot, attack or speed. If absolutely needed you may still ban an area however I seriously doubt it will be needed near as much. The current togglable areas are: sandyshores legionsquare grovestreet The current "always on" greenzones SandyPD PaletoPD MissionRowPD DavisPD --------------------------------------------------- (GZ)GreenZone Guidelines: - Only use the toggle command, DO NOT use the show or bypass commands. Anyone caught using these will be subject to disciplinary actions up to removal. - DO NOT turn off the "always on" GZs. They are not to be tampered with. - The GZ should not be left on longer than apx 15-20min max just as peacetime should not be on longer than that unless approval is granted by SA+ - When a GZ is activated it will show in chat and show an overlay on the big map. --------------------------------------------------- Update: currently disabled: GZ In Game Command: (SeniorMod+) /gz toggle [area] (This will turn ON/OFF the area specified) Current GZ areas: (MUST be typed exactly:) sandyshores, legionsquare, grovestreet --------------------------------------------------- Thanks, Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion pinned a message to this channel. 03/13/2022 12:32 PM
181 | Alex 🚑 03/13/2022 8:41 PM
[Abiding By Server Rules On/Off Staff Duty] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Hello all. I nor any other higher up staff should even have to make an announcement like I am now. We are, as staff, supposed to be mature and set the standard for other members. Myself and other Senior Members of the staff team have encountered numerous instances of staff members not following rules in server. Granted, some of these are while not being on staff duty but ALL server rules must be followed while staffing the server or not. Those in whitelist departments, of course, have their own guidelines to abide by but none of them allow for breaking server rules. While being a member of our staff team, it is essential that you show maturity, professionalism, and respect to those around you. I know sometimes we want to have fun in server but their is a time, place, and guidelines to still be followed. The staff team are to be respected individuals within server who represent the good RP, good interactions, and are essentially role models for new players who join SARP. As stated clearly in the #deleted-channel :
No Staff Member shall break server rules listed in the server rules channel Also under the "In-Game Guidelines" section of the Staff Guidelines it states: While not on duty, staff should be creating good roleplay within the server. This could be within a whitelisted department or as a civilian.
As well, members of the staff team are NOT above the rules. Breaking server rules will result in staff punishment! Thanks, @181 | Alex 🚑 - Head Of Staff Investigations

101 | Hyperion 03/17/2022 11:17 AM
[ AOP Barriers, Banned Areas & TP'd into AOP ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Please give Mr. @Zooma a fat kiss on the mouth for this one... You guys are getting even more cool toys to help control the chaos!! For those of you who have staffed for a server with AOP barriers you will be used to how this operates, for those that aren't please read over the following: The AOP barriers will prevent players from going outside of set AOPs, It will also allow for preventing players from even entering banned areas as well as TP'ing players who are out of AOP back into AOP. The system will work using the /aop command and is very simple to use. You will use it much like you already do and it will seamlessly activate and move the barriers depending on the AOP or banned area you set. TD'd into AOP When player's are outside of the current AOP, such as spawning in BC but AOP is LS, they will have 10min to get to AOP before they will be automaticly TP'd into AOP. Staff "should" be immune to this. - If AOP is LS, players will be TP'd to Legion Square - If AOP is BC, players will be TP'd to Sandy Spawn * Message constantly in the top right telling them about the 10 minute timer, once they reach AOP the message is removed. * AOP Commands: —————————— State Wide —————————— /aop State Wide [Sandy Banned] or [Legion Banned] or [Grove Banned] or [Paleto Banned] [Will open up all AOP's + add any banned areas as needed] —————————— Blaine County —————————— /aop Blaine County [Blocks off LS] /aop Sandy, Harmony, Grapeseed [Blocks off LS] /aop Blaine County [Sandy Banned] [blocks off LS + Bans Sandy Shores] /aop Blaine County [Paleto Banned] [Blocks off LS + bans Paleto Bay] —————————— Los Santos —————————— /aop Los Santos [Blocks Blaine County] /aop Mirror Park [Blocks Blaine County] /aop Los Santos [Legion Banned] [blocks Blaine county + Bans Legion Square] /aop Los Santos [Grove Banned] [Blocks Blaine county + Bans Grove] ------------------------------------------------- * *Anything not in the list above defaults to no barriers at all * Capitalization does not matter * *When banning an area as long as you have the area followed by the word ban it will ban it. * ------------------------------------------------- The GreenZones will still be avaible when needed to calm an area down without having to ban it, however please do not note them in the AOP once the new aop script goes live, simply toggle them on/off, it will print to chat and reflect on the big map. Estimated time of arrival, late tonight or tomorrow - @Zooma or I will announce when live. Thanks! (edited)

181 | Alex 🚑 03/17/2022 7:38 PM
[Dual Clan Policy Reminder] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Hello there. I just wanted to quickly remind everyone of our dual clan policy here in SARP in regards to being a member of the staff team. Firstly, I want to state for the fact that, as you might have seen, a member of our staff team decided to become a staff member on another FiveM server without our knowledge. When trying to confront them and remind them of the policy, they just left all SARP related Discords before we could process their termination. As a staff member you are allowed to play in other servers so long as you meet the time requirements set forth AND you are not holding any of the ranks below:
- Ownership - Management - Developer - Staff Team - Command Staff (Whitelist Departments) - Support Team
Any staff member caught holding any of these positions are subject to termination from staff. We take this matter severely as all of our documents and such are to be confidential to anyone not on our staff team! This is your warning now so if you are currently dual clanning (we will find out) as any of the above positions, you will be terminated following an investigation. Thanks for your time, @181 | Alex 🚑 - Head Of Staff Investigations

101 | Hyperion 03/18/2022 6:13 AM
[ AOP Script & EasyAdmin Update ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All,
Good morning everyone, two new updates have been installed into the server this morning and are available for use.. While staffing today please keep a keen eye out for any issues with either EasyAdmin or the new AOP script. We have tested both but if there are any major issues the back ups are still in server and a simple swap over is all that is needed.
AOP: Consider this weekend the beta test for the AOP script, when you ban an area there will be no visual indicator to players other than hitting a barrier and not being able to move past it and a small message that will pop up saying, "This is a banned area, please remain in aop". We may add ingame red lines to indicate the barriers but for now we would like to try it this way so it is not visually distracting to players.
[ Senior Admins+ are immune to the AOP barriers and TP notices. ] [ Refer to the AOP script announcement for instructions on how to ban an area ] ------------------------------------------------------------
EasyAdmin has a few new features, most of which are related to the management team however you can see #💻・easy-admin for one new feature, this channel will display live information about the server, things spawned in, staff calls etc..
[ Staff Calls log has been updated ] [ EasyAdmin log will log everything done/used by staff ]
IMPORTANT: EasyAdmin now has a custom keybind, when you join the server you will need to go into your GTA game settings, go to ---> Settings ---> Key Bindings ---> FiveM ---> Open EasyAdmin and set any key to open the menu, you can of course still use pagedown as your KB.
@SARP | Community Management have the ability to now kick, ban, freeze, print identifiers and clean all peds/props/vehicles from the discord without being in game. This will be reserved for urgent use only.
Please ping @Zooma for any AOP issues and ping @101 | Hyperion for any EasyAdmin issues as we will be around today. Hope everyone has a great Friday!! (edited)

101 | Hyperion 03/18/2022 5:59 PM
[ Bot Command Updates ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] For now, due to the new EasyAdmin's bot command for management being the being a built in / command in discord, the prefix for Dyno had to be changed from / to ! so there was no conflictions as Senior Admins were not able to ban using the old command as it would default to the EA ban command which they do not have access to use. The Media Bot also had to change to .play so that it was no longer the "!" command. To sum this up, staff should use !ban !mute etc.. now to engage the moderation bot.
!ban [userID] [reason] !mute [userID] [time] [reason] !warn [userID] [reason] !purge [number of messages]
Use .play <song> for the media bot Thanks, if I can figure a away around this and change them back I will let you know. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 03/19/2022 6:12 AM
[ EasyAdmin Notifications ] All, You will notice EA notifications have been centralized to the standard notification stream just above the minimap. Previously we had multiple notifications showing up all over the HUD which was a bit much. This is a lot cleaner looking and blends into the game better. The only "extra" notification you will get is when someone uses /report it will print to chat as well. I have not yet located the source of that one but plan to remove it as well as it is an extra notification that is not needed and clutters chat. If you notice any problems let me know. Thanks, Hyper

We will be working to add the red lines as an indicator to players that they need to turn around and prevent everyone from simply smashing into the zones all the time. Thanks, Hyper

101 | Hyperion 03/25/2022 10:11 AM
[ Department Trainings, Server Events & AOP ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, A point of discussion this morning that I thought was obvious but may need to be better explained. If there is a department training going on and they need AOP changed to accommodate it please ensure we do so. During the department training AOP can be set to whatever area they need such as BC or LS, current player count is not to be enforced during department trainings and AOP should be set to whatever they need for the duration of the training. If there is a server event, please put AOP to statewide to allow the event to take place where needed away from the populated areas. Thanks. (edited)

101 | Hyperion 03/25/2022 7:58 PM
[ Updated Server Rule ] { @SARP | Server Staff ] Credit Staff Suggestions: Please read the following addition to #📌・server-rules which is in effect as of now and falls under restricted roleplay and restricted vehicles in #deleted-channel which would be a warning, kick or 6hr ban if needed.
7.07 - No member shall steal any LEO vehicle without proper prior roleplay (Example: Incapacitating an officer or stealing his keys via roleplay i.e. /do takes keys). Members are also not permitted to save or re-use LEO vehicles for any reason. 7.07.1 - Member's who have stolen an LEO vehicle may not use lights/sirens while driving the vehicle and may not alter the tag, equipment or paint of the vehicle. Additionally. LEO vehicles may only be stolen if not currently involved in an active scene see rule: 7.01.
Thanks!

101 | Hyperion 03/30/2022 6:24 PM
[ Unban Requests ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Few things to go over today in regards to #deleted-channel - Please slow down and ensure you are banning the right people, there is no need to rush and get in a hurry, if you ban the wrong person it will take you that much longer to ban the right person. Double check your server IDs/Names. - New Unban format: With the last easyadmin update the ban ID numbers are now listed at the end of each ban. That ban ID is by far the easiest way to locate someone to unban them. When you are going to post a unban request, please search for that person in #deleted-channel, when you find their ban message please grab the ban ID number from the end of the message and include it in the unban request. Not everyone has a discord ID in the ban list and names get misspelled at times. The ban ID is always attached to every ban we do and will always pull up that specific ban.
In game Name: Discord ID: Ban ID: Platform to be Unbanned on: Unban Date: Unban Reason:
- @deleted-role - I've also added a section in ban appeals to require people put their ban IDs in the application and how they can locate the ID, so you may not even need to search for it as it should be provided to you. Thanks! (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/04/2022 12:21 AM
[ Lockdown Review ] All, Quick review, Admin+: To lock down all public channels, use !lockdown, to end the lockdown use !lockdown end. Do not use !lock or !unlock in individual channels as it screws the system up. To prevent this I've disabled the commands all together. Do not ever lock/unlock #📸・server-treasury, this channel is always "locked" to staff only. If you use the commands in it, it screws up the permissions and everyone will be able to type in it. The !lockdown command is pre-set to lock/unlock all the public channels, all 15 of them. If you use it, it should show "locked 15/15 channels" if it says any other number such as 7/15 it is broken. You can attempt to fix it by unlocking and relocking again but if it remains broken I will have to reset channel permissions manually. I generally test this about once a month to ensure it's working and available, it was tested 2 days ago. It should also only really be used in a mass trolling or raid type situation. I have updated the unlock command in #deleted-channel, that was on me. Thanks, (edited)

2
151 | Matt 04/07/2022 11:08 PM
[Staff Application Comments/Concerns Issue] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Good Evening, It has been brought to my as well as Senior Staff Team of various issues regarding comments on Staff Applications via Forums. Let me be clear here, no member of the SARP Staff Team should be posting degrading or discourteous messages regarding one's application. For example, if someone has grammatical or punctuation errors, do NOT write that as one of your comments being a negative factor. You have to take a step back and realize that not everyone's main language is English, and even some know multiple languages. Also, put yourself in their shoes, if someone comments on "how bad your grammar or punctuation is", do you really think you'd like that? Sometimes, you have to put YOURSELF in someone else's shoes, and see what their reaction would be if you were them. Here are some examples on what to put on Staff Applications for comments: (please remember that it is advised you give a brief narrative at the end of your comments on why you chose certain key factors in one's submission) - Effort [Could be positive or negative] - Staff Experience [Could be positive or negative] - Server/Community Recognition/Interactions [Could be positive or negative] - Punishment History [Normally negative] - Whitelisted Department(s) [Usually a positive] - Age [If under age requirement, normally a negative] - There is many more you can put, but these are a few examples that have come to my mind that I normally use. What NOT to comment: (I shouldn't even have to make a whole section on this, but I am required to after seeing an influx of comments similar to these: Not even going to provide examples, you can read the narrative I will type below. For some odd reason, a few of you believe it is necessary to call people out based on effort, grammar, punctuation, etc, and it needs to stop NOW. Just because someone in their application doesn't "sound or write" like they are a older age, does NOT mean they are not of age. We in the SARP Staff Team are not here to tear others down based on how good or bad an application is, just because they don't "sound" of age. So, moral of this narrative, STOP saying you doubt someone is of the age they put on the application just because of their grammar, language knowledge, etc. This should not be happening anymore. Staff Supervisors+ have been made aware of this, and will be on watch for these comments to continue. If these comments continue after this announcement is made, disciplinary actions will be taken against you including possible strikes, suspensions, and permissions to comment on further applications. Thank you for your understanding, and have a great rest of your night. Regards, Matt H. | Head Administrator Head of Staff Personnel (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/09/2022 3:19 PM
[ Staff Team Re-Structure 2022 ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, I bring you some exciting and beneficial changes to how the staff team is organized from the Senior Admins down to trial moderators. This was done for several reasons, first being a more clearly defined chain of command, secondly more evenly distributing of responsibilities among the Senior Admins and Admins on the teams. Lastly this give the Senior Administrators more of a clear duty assignment and utilizes their high status within the team to help run it. So to begin, there will be three teams within staff that all members will be assigned to, they are: - Alpha Team Team Leader: @Jacob L. Supervisor: @Nate M. Supervisor: @Hunter S. - Bravo Team Team Leader: @154 | Zane T. Supervisor: @Justin C. Supervisor: @Deleted User - Charlie Team Team Leader: @198 | Morning Supervisor: @301 | Enis Supervisor: @CIV-03 | Sophiiiie 🌸 - Delta Team Team Leader: @215 | Mitchell W. Supervisor: @Shots Supervisor: @SoySauce05 Here shortly, you all will be assigned to your teams, each team will have equal amounts of Senior Mods, Mods and Tmods. There will be some teams where promo's will need to occur to fill a few slots to even it out and they will take place in the near future. The Fun Stuff Each team has been assigned a logo and motto, the logo's have also been added as emojis for your enjoyment. We want you guys to get to know each other in the teams and help each other grow in your journey in the staff team! Team Threads Each team will have access to their own thread attached to staff chat, in this thread you may discuss things as a team or address any issues together. The threads are private and you will only see the team you are currently assigned to. Once added, please see the pinned message. Chain of Command All members must go to their assigned Supervisors aka Administrators for any and all official questions, concerns or requests. If they do not not respond or are unable to handle your request or answer your question, you may then report to your Team Leader aka Senior Administrator. You may only go above your team leader if permission is granted to do so. Recruitment Moving forward, new trial mods will be assigned to teams evenly, one at a time so they are spread out. Each team leader is responsible for interviewing tmods assigned to their team and each team's supervisors are tasked with training new tmods assigned to them. Promotions Promotions will remain basically the same, if a slot becomes open it will be a promote and replace situation. If the team grows, an extra admin may be added to each team meaning that 4 admins will be promoted at that time. Same goes for Senior Mod. Transfers Transfers may be done on an as needed basis, if one team ends up with several retirements or resignations then others may be transferred in from other teams to help even things out. In-game & Staff RTO To be clear, none of the team structure has any affect on ingame staffing or staff RTO. That will remain the same. For example, whichever senior admin or admin is in game is who you report to, no matter what team you or they are on. The teams are discord based only for organization, COC administrative purposes. Span of Authority Further more, if a senior admin or admin instructs you to do something or not do something you are to follow those instructions, regardless of whether you are on their team or not. If you believe those instruction may be in error, you may contact you COC and discuss it with them. Cheers to our first year together and please let us know if you have any questions moving forward. Thanks, Hyper

1
101 | Hyperion
[ Interfering with Live Streams ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Some of you may know that a somewhat popular streamer was in the server for a while today. While the title of his stream was "trolling" related he didn't really troll and was simply trying to have some fun/funny roleplay. I applaud the staff that were at some of his scenes for being professional. However I noticed something that was quite upsetting overall. This was the amount of people that chose to stream snipe him and interfere with his role play for most of this time in the server. At one point there were approximately 8-10 people chasing him down all over the place yelling out of character while crashing into him. For this reason I'm going to make a slight adjustment to our "Trolling a Live Stream" ban. When staff knows a main stream or well known streamer is in game, please watch over them (not the whole team at once, preferably the highest ranking staff member on at the time.) to help stop any trolling/interfering with his stream. Do not take actions against the streamer unless they break an obvious server rule and always stay in no clip far enough away to not be noticed. What I do want you to do is issue EasyAdmin warnings to those who are CONTINUOUSLY following, chasing, yelling and interfering with the streamer. Allow people to come up and roleplay with them of course, however it will become obvious when someone is there simply to "stream snipe" and get on the stream. If they do not respond, TP them away from the stream and tell them to stop, if they do not listen you may kick them or ban them for up to 6hrs. With that said, please review the changes to the ban reasons/lengths below. These will be updated in guidelines shortly. Try your best not to freeze people around the streamer or un-noclip if at all possible so that you as staff do not also interfere with the stream if you don't have to.
Interfering with a SARP (approved) streamer = 14 Day Ban max (This is for members of the media team who are approved SARP streamers and create content for the server specifically.) Interfering with a streamer (Outside Streamer) = 6hr ban max (This is for main stream or well known streamers who happen to come into the server and are live but are not members of the SARP media team.)
To be clear you may still warn or kick before enforcing bans however these are your limits if you choose that a ban is justified. Hopefully this will help in the future as I hated seeing him have to leave the server due to the "parade" of idiots following him everywhere. For those of you who know or do not know, this streamer is former staff for SACRP and knows what staff should do and how they should conduct themselves. At one point he was asked to remove red from his name, as he relogged he defended the staff member on his stream for "just doing their job" which was nice to see. He also called staff on the server "try hards" which I take as a compliment that you guys have your shit together and are serious about doing your jobs. However lets also remember it is a game and sometimes it pays off to be flexible with players. Thanks. Hyper. (edited)
101 | Hyperion 04/10/2022 8:24 PM
[ Reminder ] All, Please review the tagged post above relating to dealing with stream snipers in server when a big streamer is in game. Thanks.

101 | Hyperion 04/13/2022 12:23 AM
[ Welcome, new Trial Moderators! ] [ @SARP | Trial Moderator ] All, Welcome to the team and congratulations on being accepted. Please take some time read over all the channels, documents and announcements. Be sure to go back and look at pinned messages in channels as well. It is very important that you gain knowledge quickly and continue to learn over the next several weeks. While I commend you for effort to get here I also give you words of warning. As trial moderators you are on very thin ice and must ensure you are following all server rules and staff guidelines to prove your self the type of staff member we wish to retain. I will say this once, you are to treat members of the community with respect, do not talk down to anyone and ensure that you are always operating in a professional manner. Never abuse your staff permissions or use them to gain any edge in roleplay. Be a team player, you may not like everyone on the team but you are required to work with them to get the job done. You are held to a higher standard and today marks the start of your journey with the team. It is true that it's hard to make it on the staff team, however it can be even harder to remain on the staff team if you make poor decisions. Again, congrats to all who were accepted! Thanks, Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/14/2022 12:47 PM
[ Mass RDM/VDM ] Slight update to ban lengths: #deleted-channel Added:
Mass RDM/VDM (Affects 3+ Members) - 7 Day ban
Individual instances of VDM/RDM remain warning, kick or 1-3 Day ban.
Hopefully this will help keep those who mass RDM/VDM out of the server a bit longer. As always, make sure to have proof or witness it yourself. Thanks. (edited)
15
101 | Hyperion 04/15/2022 5:08 AM
[ EasyAdmin Update ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, EasyAdmin has received an update this morning, you will need to go into your GTA settings ingame and go to keybinds -> FiveM -> EasyAdmin and set up your page down button or whatever you use again. This update brings a few benefits: ️ - Firstly you will notice a HUGE decrease in time spent "checking banlist" upon joining the server which makes getting into the server much faster. ️ - Secondly, and this is a big one, Moderator+ now have access to Server Management -> Cleanup Area. What this allows is for you to set a small area radius to clear cars, peds or props when needed without having to do a server wide action such as server wide car clears or entity clears. Moderators+ , as you no-clip or drive around the server and encounter abandoned cars that need to be deleted you may go into easyadmin, select cleanup area and set your radius to clear cars. For small area car clears, that do not require a chat announcement, DO NOT go above 50 as your radius. You may go smaller if you wish to clear an even smaller area around you so as not to affect others but DO NOT go any larger than 50. If you need an area larger than 50 simply announce a car clear and clear the entire server using the existing chat command. Again if you are clearing a small area, you do not need to announce it in chat or ask for permission in chat as you are not affecting the entire server, only that small area. Obviously please ensure there's not an active scene within your small radius, if there is go to 10 which will only clear cars right next to you. This should significantly cut down on the amount of server wide car clears needed as you can now "spot clean" as needed. If you encounter props that will not clear with the standard entity wipe due to modders, try using the prop clear as well. These area clears will log to #🔰・staff-easyadmin as well. Thanks! (edited)

101 | Hyperion pinned a message to this channel. 04/15/2022 5:10 AM
101 | Hyperion 04/15/2022 3:48 PM
[ Team Growth ] All, I want to thank all of you who have been helping to welcome, train and interview all of the new trial moderators. I know growth like this can be taxing and it takes time for new staff members to settle in, learn their trade and mesh well with the team. This is a much needed boost to the team overall, especially as we creep closer to summer time where more staff will be needed. Growing the team is also important to keep active members and allow for growth in the Admin+ slots. Everyone who has been accepted deserves a chance to prove themselves and we should be supporting them as their success not only helps to community as a whole but also allows us more promotion opportunities and less overall stress on ensuring there are enough staff on. Moderators+, please mentor these guys as you would have liked to have been mentored when you first came in. Mistakes will be made, they will learn quickly and have you guys to thank in the end for guiding them during this process. That said, Trial Moderators: If you received a FAST TRACK open interview expect that your trial phase will be a bit longer than those who followed the normal path. Expect no less than 3 to 4+ weeks as trial moderators before being considered for promotion to Moderator. If you are a trial moderator who went through the normal application and interview process you can expect the normal trial phase of no less than 2+ weeks. Thanks! (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/19/2022 1:23 PM
[ Marked Staff Cars ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, After some discussion and a willingness to try things which may help the quality of the server overall, we have decided to make a bit of a change in the policy regarding driving staff vehicles. In an attempt to show more of a staff presence during higher player counts which we hope in turn may help to calm areas down a bit more, staff may drive/patrol in marked staff vehicles when the player count is at or above 40 members in server. Staff must drive hyper realistic, meaning you should be abiding by traffic laws, lights, stop signs, speed limits etc.. as you are the example others should follow. You may patrol areas prone to chaos or simply park up somewhere visible such as legion square, sandy air field etc.. to show that staff are being vigilant. Do not pull up to scenes in which you were not called to or otherwise interfere with roleplay. You must also be mindful of calls and respond to them as needed. Also, no crazy colors on the staff vehicles, keep them in good taste, no bright pink or yellow etc.. Do not "chase" people, if they do not stop for you simply no clip and freeze them in their vehicle. We do not want to see any "Staff 10-80s" While we like to be discrete we also want to try and balance the effectiveness staff being seen may have on the overall quality of the server. We will monitor the effects of this both positive or negative and go from there. Thanks Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion 04/30/2022 8:31 AM
[ Built In Discord Moderation ] All, This morning our community was given access to a beta feature of discord which automatically prevents the posting of certain words and phrases into chat. This includes racist tems, hate speach, extreme profanity and others that we add manually such as kick/ban discussion. Currently, the feature is set to block and report everything that the bots are already looking for, discord will prevent it before it enters chat at all and notify us in #🔷・discord-automod. This should clean up a lot of trolling before it can even occur in chat. Since it's in beta, the bots will continue to provide backup moderations while the feature is tested. We will test/observe this for a bit and see how it reacts. Thanks.

181 | Alex 🚑 05/05/2022 6:37 PM
[Taking Care Of Yourself] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Happy Cinco de Mayo everyone! I just wanted to say a few things and give you guys a check-in. This announcement is really guided to those of you who have been working really hard lately to make SARP a greater place for everyone! Your hard work and dedication really shows and it doesn't go unnoticed by any of us. I just want to remind everyone that sometimes it is ok to take a break when need be. I have seen a recent increase in having a large amount of staff members on at one time. We really appreciate your dedication to the staff team and we know you are trying your best to meet your hours for the month but please take in account your mental health. I, along with others, would really hate to see any of you burn out or even lose your cool. We in recent times have reduced the required hours to help alleviate this and we also try our hardest to give everyone a chance to RP. I would like to remind you though that while staffing is important, we need to ensure our whitelist departments are putting forth effort and creating that good RP we all love. I would like to give you guys a few tips and pointers to remember while staffing in server.
- Try and take a break every so often (about every 30-45ish minutes) to allow for you to take time for yourself - If you start getting angry or upset with others, kindly ask if you can go RP for a little to blow off steam. If you can't, go on a small break for a few to calm down. - If you have been staffing for a while and there is sufficient staff on, ask if you can go on as a department or just as a CIV. This allows you to take a break and have some fun, as after all, this is just a video game.
Just remember, if you need anything at all, please don't hesitate to let me know or someone else if I'm not available. You guys have been doing really great so far. Keep up the great work! Also, make sure if you would like to bring something up for everyone or to voice your suggestions/comments/concerns at the staff meeting, that you fill out the Meeting Talking Points Form found in #deleted-channel. Signed, @181 | Alex 🚑 - Head Of Staff Investigations (edited)

101 | Hyperion 05/05/2022 11:00 PM
[ Discord Update & Redesign ] All, In the next several days we should gain access to a new feature called forums channels which will enable us to better organize and condense the discord so that it is not so lengthy in certain areas. The staff section will be one of the first to get an updated structure as it is so large it can almost be it's own discord. Forums channels are very much like a Channel Hub which will contain multiple channels within them, these will be actual channels not threads. Some current staff channels will remain, many will go into categories, you can also "follow" certain channels if you'd like within the forum channel's main hub. I will also be looking at condensing logs into simply, Discord Logs & Server Logs which will contain the relevant logs within them. This will take time however as all the relevant webhooks will need updating. My whole point here is don't freak out if you wake up one day to a different looking staff or other section of the discord. Thanks, Hyper (edited)

115 | Isaac Z. 05/08/2022 1:29 PM
[ RTO Etiquette & Professionalism ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, It has come to my attention that some of you have discussions or jokes inappropriate for staff RTO. The staff RTO is a place for your work related discussion while staffing. Talk is to be kept SFW and free from obnoxious behaviors as such. I’m fine with conversations as long as it stops when a staff member asks a question or makes a request. Any and all berating or “friendly jokes” need to be done in a separate channel or in private DM’s preferably as they can be distracting or misconstrued. In terms of professionalism, if I hear that a staff member toggles peacetime just to mess with another staff member again, there will be disciplinary action, and likely termination. You are expected to be mature and frankly it seems the team needs constant reminder of this. With the new duties of Administrators+ expect more strict enforcement of conduct as we crack down on staff conduct. Please react with ✅ when you have read this. Thanks, Isaac

181 | Alex 🚑 05/08/2022 4:56 PM
In addition to the announcement above, if you feel someone is taking things too far or you start feeling offended, please reach out. If I am in RTO, please feel free to tell me if things are going too far, the conversations are too crude, etc. I am more than willing to 10-1 and speak to that individual 1 on 1. You should never at any point feel disrespected while trying to staff in server. Now if you are asked to stop speaking on a particular subject deemed offensive/inappropriate, you may be pulled aside and dealt with by an Admin+. This is your warning to stop whatever the conversation was going on. It is ok to have small conversations in Staff RTO but they need to be kept to a minimum. Interrupting other staff members trying to speak or if someone pops in really quick don't cut them off. [ Staff Scene's ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, It's very simple guys. DO NOT go to another staff member's scene unless you are REQUESTED to do so, or are a supervisor+ If you are a supervisor+ you should spectate or no clip and observe unless directly needed. The next time 5 staff members show up to a scene where they are not requested and do nothing but make a small issue a bigger one they will be sent offline for the night. 33
101 | Hyperion 05/11/2022 3:25 PM
[ Server Weapons, Tier System ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, I wanted to loop staff in on something that will likely go into effect late tonight/early morning in the server regarding weapons. We are going to experiment with a tier system aka trust system as it relates to weapons in the server. This system will role lock all weapons to you dependent on what role you have. For example, new members or members who are not whitelisted/part of a department will only have access to handguns and melee weapons. Pubcops will only have access to less lethal shotgun, taser and handguns. Non LEO members will not have access to less lethal or tasers. All other members of any whitelisted department will have access to basically all weapons however some may be restricted by department or rank as well. Some weapons may be department specific such as LEO rifles, Snipers etc.. FAA/COMS/FD will also gain access to long guns while doing civilian roleplay but some may be restricted to certified civilians. It's a custom list that may require some editing and tinkering with as we move forward, but the overall goal is to establish a tier'd system where trusted members have higher weapon access than new or non whitelisted members. Overall, it is our hopes that this cuts down on all the random rifle fire, choas and some RDM as new, non-trusted members will not have access to fully auto weapons. This should also help drive applications to departments in which you should ensure basic quality of the applicant. I have opened #🔫・weapons for you guys to view, it is not currently open to the rest of the server. Things already in place: - Default peds can not spawn any weapons until they change into a non default ped. - Pubcops have been restricted from using the LEO carbine rifle. - Less lethal shotgun & Taser have been restricted to LEOs only. Thanks, comments welcome! Hyper

115 | Isaac Z. 05/15/2022 12:09 AM
[ Actions In Server ] All, We've noticed that with the reduction of Easy Admin Calls coming through at times calls for some Passive RP or "Break" for the On Duty Staff but just because there hasn't been a call that minute doesn't mean there weren't previous calls. If you are Actively Staffing while doing any form of Passive RP please remember to check Easy Admin for any unnoticed calls that you may have missed. If you are doing Passive RP and notice a call ensure that it gets responded to before continuing your RP. I shouldn't be seeing staff calls go unattended to for over 5 Minutes Tops. If you're too involved into your current scene that you can't respond to a staff call please remember that server care comes before Roleplay, no matter what. In conclusion, try keeping a more keen eye on Easy Admin calls, that also means that if you just came back to double check and ensure all calls are up to date and responded to before conducting or returning to your Passive RP scene. Thank You, Isaac Z. (Jacob L volunteered to write this as he was concerned)

101 | Hyperion 05/22/2022 2:32 AM
[ Server Log Updates ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Well, I was planning on sleeping but the webhook exploit has me wide awake.. The mass pinging staff got this evening was due to a troll exploiting a weakness that all webhooks have, to stop it generally we simply need to delete the webhook and create a new one. Thankfully we have no public webhooks so the normal members were not affected. If it occurs again simply ping ownership or management to delete the webhooks in those channels. Now, while re setting up the logs, I made a few adjustments.
#🔰・staff-actions - All warns, kicks, and bans in one log, makes it easier to search a members discipline history all at once. #🔶・server-chat - Now only contains in game chat and commands from players. #🔶・server-joins - Show player information regarding those joining the server. I will have player ID added soon. #deleted-channel - Only shows those leaving the server. This is helpful when trying to see who may have LTAP'd as you only have to look in that log and not fish through all the chat information as well. #🔶・server-resources - SA+ Shows all server resources being started and stopped. Most of these will be normal things being started/stopped however if you see something suspicious or constant and one of management/ownership isn't testing something let us know. Modder Screens - (removed) Is basically useless, if you wish to drop evidence regarding the banning of a modder simply do it in the #📮・evidence-drop channel.
Hopefully no more shenanigans tonight, thanks! (edited)

13
151 | Matt 05/29/2022 2:44 AM
[Staff Calls/Staff RTO] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Good evening to you all, I have had this brought to my attention by a few staff members and it must be brought to the whole team via an announcement. If you are in Staff RTO, you are expected to be actively staffing AND responding to calls. If you are seen in RTO for a long amount of time clocking in hours and you aren’t responding to any staff calls, I personally will remove the time that you clocked in. It is unfair to others who try to get their hours in while you just sit in RTO and do absolutely nothing but farm hours. If I continue to hear complaints of this and I personally witness this, you will face staff punishment, no questions asked. I try not to be that harsh on you guys, but when times like this present, you have to take the bigger step upon others. Thank you for your understanding, and be sure to remember the end of the month is soon and clock-ins will be reset, and I will be going through activity checks. If you are at Low x2 and get a activity warning this month as well, you will face termination from the SARP Staff Team. Best Regards, Matt H. | Head Administrator Head of Staff Personnel
27
151 | Matt 05/31/2022 4:33 PM

As many of you know, some comments should not be brought into the server, and unfortunately they were said by one of our fellow staff member. Hence this, he has been terminated from the Staff Team. This is a very serious situation, and it will not ever be taken lightly. If he were a normal member, this would have resulted in a permanent ban from server. Thank you all for your understanding, and clock-ins will be reset tonight promptly at 12:00AM EST tonight. 218 | Neptune 06/03/2022 8:19 PM
Staff Application Reviews Ok ladies & gentlemen its time for me to finally say my peace on this. Any of you guys who are Moderator + need to start being consist and proper when reviewing staff applications. It has been an issue for sometime now and its not only discouraging to those you are reviewing but also frustrating for me who has to accept / deny people. A lot of you guys are putting -1 for Effort for some people who deserve it and then turn around and do the same thing for others who deserve a +1 instead. A lack of effort to me is defined as either a lack of detail, i.e. short answers of three or less sentences OR bad grammar. You guys have been putting -1 on people who have typed out 5+ sentences for some answers and its aggravating to say the least. Please be more consist and accurate when reviewing applications or I will begin to restrict who can post reviews to Administrator + and save you the trouble. Please react with a ✅ once you've read this announcement and acknowledge it. Signed, Head of Recruitment - Daniel T. @SARP | Server Staff

101 | Hyperion 06/12/2022 3:23 AM
[ Growth & New Member's First Impressions ] All, I wanted to take a moment to discuss the growth we will be experiencing this summer. Obviously it's 2am currently and we have 25 people in server. We will be needing staff at later hours for the next few months so if you are a night owl or EU now if your time to shine! We will also be looking for new EU staff as well. With the new players coming in daily it's important to remember you guys will likely be their first contact with representatives from the server. To grow our community with good new members and need to make sure we make an excellent first impression. I know it's frustrating dealing with some of the people in the server, but remember that not everyone is a troll, not everyone knows the rules and not everyone deserves a kick/ban. Some people simply need a warning and to be educated on our rules. We now have the /help command in game so that everyone can look over our rules and other FAQ. When you are dealing with people please advise them of the /help command and offer to clarify any of the rules. This also means everyone needs to refresh themselves on #📌・server-rules, #deleted-channel and #deleted-channel along with #deleted-channel. The more you know, the better you can staff and the further you will go in staff. To sum it up, ensure that while you staff the server, you also represent the team, community and server with professionalism and knowledge. You guys have a lot to do with our growth! You giving a good impression will help to retain new players and grow everything from civs, departments and staff! "Help the good ones, correct the misguided and trash the trolls!" Cheers to summer, and welcoming new members to the community! Thanks, Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/13/2022 1:11 AM
[ Venom Tweaks ] All, Few minor tweaks to venom today to help with FRP, if you see someone getting kicked for "cheating" and the kick message in logs says spawned over 20 vehicles, they were mass spawning or spawning the same vehicle over and over again to exploit the flying glitch. I tested this myself, if you are simply going down the list normally, spawning vehicles to check them out it does nothing. Also, due to the abuse of it, for those who have access to torque, x2 torque is the current limit allowed for roleplay, #📌・server-rules. Venom will now dv someone's vehicle if they go past x4 torque, so if someone is complaining their vehicle is being deleted, ask them if they are using torque, if so they need to keep it under x2. I tried to limited it to x2 but it was a big finicky and would delete at x2 half the time. And, due to the chat log @-everyone issue today, venom will now autokick anyone who does that in game chat. If it becomes a bigger problem we can make it a ban but as that's the first time in over a year I hope it wont become the new troll thing. Thanks, Hyper Also, *I know there has been an increase in lag in the server the past week, still unsure exact what it is, I'm checking various scripts to see if it's a specific script or what. * (edited)

218 | Neptune 06/25/2022 1:16 AM
Politics, Religion, Race & Sexual Orientation Conversations How's it going ladies and gentlemen, its become apparent to not only myself but other members of Staff Leadership that an announcement needs to be made regarding tonight's events. Please allow me to be very clear here, debates regarding politics, religion, race and or sexual orientation are not to be had on any of SARPs platforms. This server has members from all over the world, people of all sexual orientations and races, some of who that are religious and others who are not. I will not allow you guys to debate these hot topics in public or staff chats or channels. What you talk about in a private channel or discord is not of my concern. This community is exactly that, a community. We all come on here to have fun and roleplay on FiveM. This is the same reason we don't allow in-game riots or protest because people would bring real life issues into the server. So please reframe from debating and or arguing about your beliefs, I understand all of us are very different people but we are all one team and the last thing any of us in leadership want is for you guys to dislike or hate someone simply because they view the world differently then you. Please be respectful, please be professional and have fun guys. Please react with a ✅ once you've read this announcement and acknowledge it. Signed, Department Manager - Julian G. In-game Manager - Ozzy M. Head Administrator - Daniel T. @SARP | Community Ownership @SARP | Community Management @SARP | Server Staff (edited)

101 | Hyperion 06/25/2022 7:57 PM
[ The incident ] All, The Annon Admin bans were looked into and determined to be fake leave messages, there were no actual bans however they were very clever in their replicating of it as it fooled everyone into thinking someone had gained access to EA. The short of it is they would "ban" themselves" then join back under another name and do the same thing. We compared the ban messages to actual ban messages and they were close but not exact. If it starts occurring again we can likely ban the person leaving to stop the spoofing. Thanks! Hyper

115 | Isaac Z. 07/04/2022 6:16 PM
[Fireworks Script V2] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, If any of you have tried using the fireworks script today you probably noticed it looks better. What you may not of known is there is a little more to it than just the different effects. Yours truly has made some additions to the fireworks script: New command parameters (both optional, no input will result in 1 box and normal mode): /sf , number of boxes (integer 1-10), finale mode (boolean | 0, 1, true, false) Example: /sf 5 1 (5 boxes and finale mode active) Using the command will place the boxes staggered in a line in front of you, with rows of 5. Initial fuse is 10 seconds and all boxes will remove themselves after the show is over. Happy 4th, Isaac (edited)

7
101 | Hyperion 07/05/2022 1:41 AM
[ Reserve Staff Hourly Requirement ] [ @SARP | Reserve Moderator ] All, I wanted to update you guys if you hadn't already been contacted related to reserve hourly requirement. Basically, reserves are required to work 5hrs a month. This requirement has not been enforced for the last year and a half partly due to allowing HC members to set up departments and partly due to us being busy with other projects. However, effective now we will be enforcing the reserve hourly requirement. This is a very low hourly requirement and should be feasible for the vast majority of you guys. The reserve program was installed to 1) Give trusted HC members the ability to deal with issues in game rather than depending on staff and 2) To aid the active staff members in times of need. Please take this opportunity to start working in your hours even if it's simply 1 hour a week. We appreciate all of you and your hard work in the community! If you have any issues please get with @Jacob L. as he will be the Senior Admin assigned to manage the reserves and monitor activity levels. Thanks Hyper (edited)

151 | Matt 07/14/2022 8:36 PM
[Peacetime/In Server Responsibilities] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] Good evening, I am making this announcement to better remind some of the new and old staff members of peacetime expectations. If you turn on peacetime, it should be on for NO LONGER than 25-30 minutes at a time. If it is on longer than that, turn it off immediately. Nobody will want to RP if it is constantly on, and we know this. The ONLY exception to peacetime being on for longer than the time above would be if there is ZERO staff in the server. This is the only exception, no others unless indicated by a Head Administrator+. Thank you, and please react with a ✅ upon reading this announcement in its entirety. Regards, Matt H. | Head Administrator Head of Staff Personnel
34

2
101 | Hyperion 07/17/2022 12:44 AM
[ House keeping ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, From the looks of some of these staff reports (which may be exaggerated I know), some of you may not be allowing members to explain their side of things. Yes, if you witness something you may take actions, however you must ask the member their side of it. As we all know, sometimes things are not as they appear. If you didn't whiteness it, you must have clips from someone or spectate them for a bit and see if the report is valid and they do it again. For example, you may see someone driving a bit erratic however you may not know that they are involved in a criminal RP and are running from the scene. You may see someone crash into someone else, however we all know desync exists and sometimes they really didn't see it on their side. Your interactions should follow a simple script each time you interact with someone, asking the same type of questions each time such as. What happened? or Why did you do that? Explain why you did that? and "You can not do that due to server rules" ect.. Allowing someone time to explain may change your mind on the type of player they are, they may sincerely apologize, not have known the rule ect... For those that are obviously trolling, simply ask them "Why?" most of the time they will just laugh and shoot you in the head. At that point, staff sit over, bounce them into fuck off land. Professionally of course. Those that do not care and are simply here to be a twat are easy to spot once you start speaking with them and ask them their side. Also please direct members you encounter to use /rules so that they may see them in game and have a better chance at referring to them next time. Thanks. Hyper (edited)
22
4
4
101 | Hyperion 07/17/2022 12:53 AM
[ Name Change Log ] As most of you have noticed, we now have a log dedicated to those leaving the server and rejoining to changing their name. While most of these are of no issue and are simply people updating their name or call-sign, this can catch some sneaky trolls as well. This would have been useful a few weeks ago when those trolls were exploiting the leave message and making it appear as some rouge admin was hijacking easy admin and banning everyone. They would simply re-join under another name and do it again. It was so believable we shut the server down to review all the evidence before we figured out what had occurred. If someone tries it again this will clearly show you who and what name they are using/changing to and who they were when they left. It will also help track some trolls. Now, no staff member should be playing in the server under a different name than what they normally use. If it is seen in the logs, you will be questioned. If Management sees it, you may be kicked for name change. No sneakiness allowed. Thanks. Hyper (edited)

101 | Hyperion 07/17/2022 3:16 PM
[ Staff Team Structure ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Some months ago, we tried a team style setup for staff. Through discussions with the HAs it has been determined that the majority of us prefer the simplistic nature of the standard team format. As such we will be transitioning back to it today. This will again make interviews, trainings and promotions a bit more streamlined for everyone. Please ensure you continue to follow your chain of command starting at the Administrator level if you have any issues or concerns. You may go above administrators to Senior Admins if the Administrator is not able to assist you and advises you to check with a Senior Admin. At this point, any SA can do interviews for new staff, and any Admin can do staff trainings for those who ping. We currently have several pending so let's try and reach out to them and ensure they know the process and are still interested in being interviewed and trained. Thanks! Hyper
22
101 | Hyperion 07/22/2022 3:45 AM
[ Peace Time & LEOs ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, I wanted to reiterate and clarify something. Peacetime should not be based on the LEO count. Civilians may commit crimes against other civilians even if LEOs are not on. Please remember civilians can create criminal roleplay among themselves. The next time peacetime is left on for longer than 30min, the highest in RTO will be held accountable and will be questioned as to why. The only exception of course is late at night when no staff are on, you may leave it on when leaving the server. Just like banning an area, everything should be done in waves. If you ban an area too long, they all simply clump up somewhere else. So you ban an area for 15min or so then unban it, it keeps people moving around a bit. The same goes with PT, if it's left on too long players get bored and simply leave the server. You have to balance it. Also, if the number of staff on is low, there is no need to try and monitor every priority in the server, don't stress yourself out, fly around, look for things and respond to calls as needed. If you do have a good amount of staff on feel free to watch prios at a distance if needed. We have an incredible team, but we also must work on house keeping frequently to ensure we are all operating at peak levels and within guidelines. Thanks, Hyper

Charlie S. 07/23/2022 8:15 AM
[ Economy Rules ] [ @SARP | Server Staff ] All, Here very shortly, there are going to be three new Rule Addition to the Game Server.
️ 9.01 - No member shall duplicate or exploit any item, bank account, or cash. All known Bugs must be reported to a Staff Team Member, to be investigated. ️ 9.02 - No member shall take benefit from the Economy, via the means of cash, bank, or items, in return for anything external to the Integrated Economy. This includes, but does not limit to: Personal Imports. ️ 9.03 - No member shall use teleportation, or any form of "fast travel", as a means to obtain an unfair advantage amongst the playerbase, including Jobs, Limited & Purchasable Properties, etc.
Violation(s) of 9.01 - 3 Day Ban | MUST be Reported to @Charlie S. for further Investigation. Violation(s) of 9.02 - 3 Day Ban | MUST be Reported to @Charlie S. for further Investigation. Violation(s) of 9.03 - Falls under "FailRP"
These rules come in response to some concerning reports, during the time of my LoA. I will be working tirelessly to try and create the most balanced experience for everyone with the new found Economy. I would like to thank everyone for their continued Reports, so any "Bugs" can be mitigated ASAP. Again, pleas visit #deleted-channel, to report any Bugs, whether it be Economy based, or beyond. Please react with a once you have read & understood. Any questions, send them my way! Thanks, Charlie
